name: Nice apartment with a marvelous terrace
house_rules: No shoes in the apartment and no smoking inside the apartment, there is a big terrace you can smoke

host.host_about: Hi we are a gay couple living in Montreal, very quiet, respectful and clean

reviews.comments: Carlos y Lucien son excelentes anfitriones, amables y respetuosos quienes hicieron todo lo posible para asegurarnos una estancia agradable. Mi esposa y yo vinimos a vivir a Montreal y ellos fueron de mucha ayuda para nosotros. El apartamento es limpio, amplio, e iluminado. Lo mismo la habitación, en la que llegamos a sentirnos muy cómodos teniendo en cuenta que fue una estancia de 16 noches. Los espacios comunes son bonitos y confortables. El hospedaje está ubicado cerca de una boca de metro, y a otros sitios de interés turístico como el jardin botánico, el parque olímpico y la torre de Montreal. 100% recomendable.

To stay in Carlo's apartment was unforgettable experience. It is beautiful, very comfortable, conveniently located. We loved everything about it. Carlo is amazing hosts, welcoming and very helpful. So, this is great place. Economical and excellent for the savvy traveler. Internet was very fast and overview from terrace was great. Thank you!!

Un endroit très propre et magnifique avec une vue exceptionnelle ! Par contre j’ai crue que c’etais un appart complet , le titre m’a un peut tromper .
Autre seule point pour ma part j’ai trouver un peut compliquer de me rendre la première fois ! 
Malgré tout cela je crois que se sont des hôtes de bonne qualités et vrt très propre ! Endroit a1 !

“My Friend and I spent one week at Carlose apartment. It was beyond our expectations. The hospitality of Carlos and his partner was wonderful. The Apartment was super clean, specious with amazing view especially in the sunrise or sunset. I was looking for a 5 -star hotel to relax for at least 2 nights. But I was blessed to spend a week of relaxing in this 5-star luxurious apartment for lower price”.
Thank you Carlos and Lucien

Thank you for everything :)
Everything was perfect: the warm hospitality, the friendliness, the room, the cleanliness. 
I recommend this rental!
Great place, beautiful, feel very welcome,

name: Nişantaşı Flat
summary: Fresh place in the center of Nişantaşı with an easy connection to every part of the city. In walking distance you can reach metro, ferryboat and bus transportation. Also location knows as divine district of Istanbul with full of famous brands and authentic shops and cafes.  Apartment is recently renovated and fully equipped for any kind of staying (business, family, touristic). The place is also pet friendly :)
space: Cozy and fresh place with one bedroom and living space. Flat has capability for 4 people of staying with comfort. Kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, washing machine and any kind of tool that you need for cooking. Bathroom is fresh and recently renovated. Living room has a dining table, TV and comfort sofa also for other 2 guests. Suitable for variety of staying including business, family and touristic purposes.
description: Fresh place in the center of Nişantaşı with an easy connection to every part of the city. In walking distance you can reach metro, ferryboat and bus transportation. Also location knows as divine district of Istanbul with full of famous brands and authentic shops and cafes.  Apartment is recently renovated and fully equipped for any kind of staying (business, family, touristic). The place is also pet friendly :) Cozy and fresh place with one bedroom and living space. Flat has capability for 4 people of staying with comfort. Kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, washing machine and any kind of tool that you need for cooking. Bathroom is fresh and recently renovated. Living room has a dining table, TV and comfort sofa also for other 2 guests. Suitable for variety of staying including business, family and touristic purposes. Guests are allowed to rent the entire flat. Apartment is only open to rent totally. In any case of guidance or help I will be here just a phone call away :) Istan
neighborhood_overview: Istanbul know as city of different central locations. Nişantaşı and Beşiktaş are also known as couple of them. In the heart of Istanbul,  you will be able to connect both sides with different public transport solutions. In walking distance  (5 min) you'll be able reach famous streets with worldwide brands, authentic shops, cafes and , global cuisine.
notes: Enjoy your staying with freely :)
transit: 10 minutes to Osmanbey metro station by walk which you can reach to Taksim square with 1 stop. Also 15 minutes by walk to Beşiktaş square and you can connect to Kadıköy with ferryboat.
access: Guests are allowed to rent the entire flat.
interaction: Apartment is only open to rent totally. In any case of guidance or help I will be here just a phone call away :)

reviews.comments: Loved it here. Charming and spotless little studio-flat in a scilent corner of Beşiktaş.  Excellent wifi, clean and practical kitchen. Dilara was superfriendly, quick to respond and helpful with information about the city.  I will look for this flat next time im in Istanbul.

Ev sahibi hızlı geri dönüş yapıyor, güleryüzlü ve nazik bir insan. Ev çok güzel ve konforlu. İhtiyacınız olan her şey var neredeyse. Kendi evimizde gibi rahat ettik diyebiliriz. Evin konumu merkezi olduğu için ulaşım çok rahat. Bir sonraki İstanbul seyahatimizde tekrar kalmak isteyeceğimiz bir yer. Tavsiye ederiz.
dilara hem güler yüzlü hem konuksever.ev oldukça merkezi temiz ve yeterli.bir daha geldiğimde kesinlikle tercih edebileceğim bir yer
Great location,  clean and beautiful place, lovely person :)
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Konumu ve fiyatı dikkate alındığında nadir bulunabilecek bir daire, ev sahibi özellikle saatler konusunda çok yardımcıydı, müsait olduğu sürece istanbul konaklamalarımda sürekli tercih edeceğim.

Çok temiz, konforlu, tatlı bir evdi ve ihtiyacımız olan herşey mevcuttu. Ev konum itibariyle hem Nişantaşı’nın merkezinde olup aynı zamanda trafik bulunmayan sakin bir sokakta (sesten rahatsız olanlara). Çok memnun kaldık kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

The place’s location can’t be beat. It’s in the most amazing neighborhood, close to other interesting parts of the city and in walking distance to some of Istanbul’s best cafes, breakfast places and restaurants. We were truly happy and grateful to be in Dilara’s apartment because the location made our stay so much nicer. The beds were very comfortable after our long days spent walking around. Bedsheets and towels were clean which made it easy to feel at home. Lots of storage space in case you stay longer. Very good and reliable high speed internet, equipped kitchen for your basic needs, cozy living room! Everything was amazing. Dilara gave us amazing recommendations whenever we needed help or had questions about things in the area. She was always in reach and responded quickly every time we needed to ask a question. Truly one of the best hosts out there! Thank you Dilara :)

My only criticism is that in the bathroom, either the sink or the shower drain was giving off an odor that made it a bit smelly. I’m sure it can be easily fixed though.

name: OPORTO GUEST Studio Bolhão 2
summary: Estúdio muito acolhedor mesmo em frente ao Mercado do Bolhão e a 100 metros da famosa Rua de Santa Catarina. Localizado no coração da Baixa do Porto, é perfeito para 3 pessoas conhecerem a Cidade.
space: O apartamento tem um quarto com uma confortável cama de casal e um sofá-cama na sala para uma pessoa. Casa de banho e cozinha totalmente equipadas. Wi-fi e diversos canais por cabo gratuitos. Voltado para as traseiras do prédio, o que faz com que não haja ruído.

neighborhood_overview: Esta é uma rua Comercial, o que faz com que durante o dia seja muito movimentada e, durante a noite é calma. Nas redondezas tem todos os tipos de comercio supermercado, confeitarias, farmácias, bons restaurantes...
notes: Pede-se todo o cuidado com o barulho a noite a partir da 22 horas, e em especial na hora de chegar ao apartamento. •Não é permitido fumar dentro nos apartamentos •Não são permitidos quaisquer tipos de animais domésticos. •Pede-se todo o cuidado com os objetos de decoração, mobiliário e roupas de cama e banho. •Cuidado no manuseamento dos equipamentos de cozinha, alguma dúvida estamos prontos para esclarecer.
transit: O centro da cidade pode ser todo percorrido a pé. Fora do centro aconselhamos o uso do Metro do Porto, cuja estação mais próxima do apartamento é o Bolhão.
access: Apartamento, elevador e zonas comuns do prédio.

host.host_about: Somos nativos do Porto, nascidos e criados aqui. Adoramos a nossa cidade, e gostamos muito de passar este gosto aos nossos visitantes, uma vez que como também adoramos viajar,  sabemos identificar as necessidades dos nossos Turistas. Gostamos de receber bem, e fazemos com gosto!

name: Un chez vous confortable et spacieux .
summary: Appartement lumineux et propre et entrée privée, avec tout les articles nécessaires, a 5 min du centre ville, bien situé, pour les familles qui ont des petits, approximite des garderies privés.

Entier Je suis disponible 24/24 par message et de 7h a 22h par tél et flexible pour recevoir les voyageurs a n'importe quelle heure. neighborhood_overview: Un quartier sécurisé et calme, le stationnement  est disponible  sur la rue devant l'appartement samedi et dimanche, et du lundi à vendredi de 9h30AM a 8 AM ( juste entre 8h et 9h30 il faut enlever l'auto pour le nettoyage de la ville ), il y a aussi des places libres dans les rues voisines. Je vous informerais dépendamment de votre jour de séjour. Et s'il y a des travaux.
notes: Si vous arrivez par l'autoroute 40 prenez la sortie d'iberville Sud, et si vous arrivez de l'autoroute 720 continuer tout droit après la fin de l'autoroute et tournée à gauche sur frontenac. En bus 97 et 94 arretez vous a l'intersection mont-royale et Iberville, et marcher 1mn vers le nord.
transit: L'app est à 1mn à pied pour 2 station de bus pour se rendre au centre ville.

reviews.comments: Responses were very quick and communicated effectively despite English not being the primary language.
Great location, thoughtful host, well-equipped kitchen, really good value. Would definitely book again!
Nice location and host!
Súper bonito el apartamento y cómodo, todo súper limpio y la anfitriona siempre bien amable
Meryem was very warm and was always available to answer any questions. As a first time user of AirBnb, she was a great welcome! The space was clean and the environment was lovely!
My friends and I had a great stay, even went out of her way to leave coffee going for us upon our arrival.  Would definitely repeat in the future.
Logement top et bien placé, Meryem nous a très bien accueilli et a été très disponible pour nous. Merci beaucoup, je recommande !

Facile d'accès par la 20 ou par la 40. 
Belle grandeur, air climatisée. 
Meryem répond rapidement à nos questions

L’appartement de Meryem est comme la description, très propre et grand. Meryem est hyper disponible, répond rapidement à nos questions et très arrangeante pour les horaires d’arrivee, de départ ou dépôt des bagages.
On se sentait comme a la maison!

Meryem was very accommodating and responsive to our messages. She was very helpful working around our busy schedule to make sure that we could check-in and check-out within our timeframe. We were only in the BnB a short time but it was just what we needed! Thanks Meryem :)
Merci beaucoup pour cette appartement . si elle est disponible quand je vais y retourner je vais la relouer c'est sur !

Really nice apartement.
Everything was clean.
It gets a little noisy because of the street next to it.
Stayed for the night and loved it! Very cozy and lovely host. Also very close to public transportation to get to the metro or downtown.
kind host, comfortable beddings, nice kitchen! Better than photos.
It really felt home away from home...Meryem was very prompt in responses and had a great stay at her place... Would like to stay again if we visit Montreal☺️

Meryem was extremely helpful and kind. On top of quick responses, she drove down impromptu late at night to help us find a parking lot cause we didn’t know how to read the French parking signs, and patiently explained to us on how to read the parking signs despite English not being her primary language. She also always made sure we could find parking every subsequent night. The place is very nice as pictured and definitely good value for money!
Bon séjour chez Meryem. Nous ne l’avons pas rencontré mais elle a répondu rapidement à toutes nos questions.
Appartement parfaitement propre, bien équipé, spatieux et agréable
Meryem a été d’une gentillesse super appréciée, en plus d’être très réactive. Très bonne hôtesse!
Hôte très réactive et logement très bien situe
Parking right in front of home except Mon-Thursday. Host accomodated early check in and was prompt in responding. Take your own paper towels. Very close to Botanical Gardens.
It’s a bit old house and You get basic stuff with this rental.. but given the price I feel it’s ok. Located on a Main Street with pretty good traffic.
Nous n'avons pas aimé le quartier, appartement donnant sur un boulevard bruyant et sinistre.
Très bon séjour, Meryem est arrangeante et communique efficacement. L'appartement est conforme à la description et vaut largement son prix !
Endroit parfait pour passer un séjour. Très propre, et un vrai lit pour tout les voyageurs ;)
Appartement adapté au famille avec enfants en bas âge. appartement chaleureux.

Super endroit, hôte très accueillante et toujours réactive aux messages et prêtes à nous aider. Seul bémol, assez loin du centre mais très proche du stade olympique. Sinon, nous le recommandons vivement pour vos futurs voyages à Montréal.

Super appartement fonctionnel pour un séjour en famille !Rapport qualité prix imbattable. Pratique pour visite avec la voiture ou prévoir de la marche car bus moins réguliers que le métro.

Excellent accueil!

We booked Meriem’s place last minute and Meriem was very kind to accept our booking request. And Meriem showed us the place to park even though it was late at night. Thank you Meriem very much for your great hospitality. The place was great and close to everything.
Great place, nice location near bars, restaurants and supermarket!! Meriem is very helpful and quick at communicating!
Bien situé, efficace pour un court séjour.

Warm home, quick responses from the host, has basic kitchen stuff, has toiletries. Basically it has all you need to temporarily stay in her apartment. You just need to bring groceries(depends on you if you want to cook or just eat out). There’s a grocery store nearby. There was a parking area near the apartment and Meriem said it was because it was the weekends. Enjoy your stay there!
Meriem est très accueillante et disponible. L'emplacement est très pratique et l'appartement dispose de ce qui est important pour un séjour.

This was a lovely airbnb! Exactly as expected, very clean and with all the amenities you need. Check in and out was very simple and easy, and Meriem was always very quick to respond to any queries. Would definitely stay again!
The place was nice and clean. Parking in front of the house was mostly full, so we had to park in the small lot near the house and move the car in the morning.
Meriem is a welcoming host. The apartment is very close to lots of cool shops, cafes and grocery stores. It is a good value for the money!

Simple, propre, beau,  belle communication avec Meriem.
Bien situé aussi!
Très bonne nuit dans ce logement, l’endroit est confortable et agréable.
appartement spacieux,bien équipé et propre Accueil très agréable de Myriem Très bon séjour

Meriem is an amazing host. My large party ended up having some damage issues because of an unruly guest and she has been so understanding. She is very kind and has an amazing space that is perfect for many guests. The apartment was wonderful and is a great price for the space and location.
easy going hostess.

summary: My place  is very centrally located Istanbul Taksim and offers you a great stay in Istanbul,Taksim. We are just a two minute walk to Taksim Square and the rich shopping district of Istiklal Street, the main pedestrian thoroughfare of Beyoglu. Public transit including various buses, metro trains, and ferrires are just a few minutes away. The new extension of the metro makes it very simple to get to historic Sultan Ahmet, the old town of Istanbul. If you need a shuttle service Inform me.

host.host_about:
Hi!
I am Steve Esselink, a Dutch guy that lives for almost 10 years in Rio de Janeiro now. My Brazilian wife Cassia and our two kids Gleiciane (15) and Joaquim (5) are happy to show you the Carioca way of life. We love going to the beach to surf, play futevolei or just relax, hike to waterfalls in the Tijuca Forrest, go to the samba schools or pagode concerts and go out eating (Japanese, Arab or Brazilian). Come and enjoy Rio with us!

name: Williamsburg great location
summary: This is a really great apartment in an excellent area for a low price and I would love someone to take good care of it when they stay.
space: If you are interested, I would love to hear from you! It really is an excellent authentic Brooklyn apartment in an amazing location!! THE ROOM The bedroom is located at the back of a spacious, sunny apartment. The room itself is spacious, it has great furniture and a really comfortable queen size bed! It has two large windows which cast sunlight in during the morning. The room would be perfect either for one person or a couple. THE APARTMENT The apartment is really spacious with nice furniture and wood floors. The kitchen is great, it gets loads of natural light and is fully equipped with everything you need for cooking up a storm! I have a cozy little dining table perfect for any meals. I don't have a TV, but I have high speed internet.  LOCATION The location is truly perfect! Located in South Williamsbur

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi! I am a graphic designer living and working in New York City in a lovely apartment in South Williamsburg. It is just few blocks from the Bedford L and central to lots of nice restaurants and bars in Williamsburg.

reviews.comments: Me and my girlfriend had our first trip ever to NYC, and it was the first time ever we used Airbnb. Eva and her boufriend have been absolutely welcoming since our first email contact: they provided us lot of informations about the apartment and the sorroundings, and we immediately felt comfortable about our booking. We had the chance to meet them a our arrival, and we exchanged some more details about the apartment and the sorroundings, key return, minor duties for apartment care (such as watering plants) and neighborhood attractions. They kindly wrote us down a list of attractions, restaurants and things to do in Williamsburg and in the sorrounding area. The apartment is located 50 meters away from Bedford Ave, a very busy street fullfilled with bars, restaurants, 24/7 shops: not very much car traffic, but a lot of people going round which made us feel completely comfortable and safe even when coming back late at night. Wiliamsburg is a good place where to stay in general, a residential area with many restaurants, live music bars, busy but not chaotic The subway station is about 7-8 minutes walk from the apartment, and it is 3 stops away from the Greenwich Village in Manhattan, an area we enjoyed during our stay. The apartment itself was comfortable for us, big enough for two persons (kitchen, living room, bedroom, studio), especially for us which spent a lot of time touring the city and didn't really need that much living space. The fast internet connection allowed us to call home through (Hidden by Airbnb) , and the AC helped us survive the NYC summer heat! Neighbors were quite silent, and the experience was very positive. We surely recommend Eva and Kent.
Very cute apartment in a great neighborhood! We had a fantastic time there.

Ken and Eva's place is really nice. It is very well located, the neighbourhood is awsome with lot of shops, good restaurants...
Communication was very easy:  they send us before our arrival a folder with good adresses they recommend. 
I would definitely stay there again!

We had a wonderful time at Ken and Eva's flat. They made it extremely easy to pick up keys and left clear instructions as to how to get in and out, along with other useful information about the area. Williamsburg is fantastic and buzzing, however the flat is in a quiet street which means you get the excitement without the noise. The flat itself is really cosy and comfortable and although we were hardly there it served all our needs: great internet connection and really useful to have the studio area to leave our luggage and computers. We recommend Ken and Eva's flat wholeheartedly! Plus, we hope to be back again one day!

Ken's apartment is better than the pictures. Great location, right in the heart of Williamsburg and around 10 minutes walk or less to the L train into Manhattan. I loved it. Ken is a fantastic host. Highly recommend.

We had a great stay at Ken's apartment, it's very roomy for two and really nicely laid out.

Williamsburg was brilliant, lots of local shops, restaurants & especially bars to try out and Ken gave a good list of places to go. Very easy to get into Manhattan, we walked over the Williamsburg Bridge and through the city one day, but for the other days the L train was quick and convenient.

Ken met us at the flat to give us the keys, wifi password etc and was very helpful with any further questions in the week.

Highly recommended!

Ken is a very good host & the appartment is very nice. The location is perfect and my husband especially enjoyed the beamer and netflix ;) We furthermore liked the neighbourhood a lot! We would recommend you staying at Ken's place!

we had a great time staying at Ken's place.

the apartment is beautiful and spacious and you will find everything you need. 

ken is very helpful and get back to you very quick if you contact him for questions.

the neighborhood is nice with lots of little shops, bars and restaurants.

Would recommend it to everyone and I am pretty sure I will come back myself.

Excellent first experience! We have not met Ken but he was very quick to respond to each email (less than an hour!) And extremely accurate in the details necessary for a successful trip.
Williamsburg is a very nice area of Brooklyn & we does not regret our choice. A remake eyes closed!

Excellente 1ère expérience ! Nous n'avons pas rencontré Ken mais il a été très rapide pour répondre à chaque mail (moins d'une heure!!) et extrèmement précis dans les détails nécessaires au bon déroulement du voyage.
Williamsburg est un quartier très agréable de Brooklyn & nous ne regrettons nullement notre choix. A refaire les yeux fermés !

Ken's flat was perfect for what we wanted - a real home away from home. It provided us with a genuine feel for Williamsburg. The location was second-to-none, just a stone's throw away from the ever lively Bedford Avenue and very close to the subway into Manhatten too. Being our first time to Brooklyn, we felt safe and secure in both the building and the area. 
Ken was also a great host. Not only was he incredibly quick to reply to any queries, but left a useful guide list of things to visit.
I would not hesitate in recommending this flat or Ken as a host!
Kens place was perfect and he was a wonderful host.  Great location, clean and easy. Ill be staying there again on my next trip back to williamsburg. Thank you ken

We had an amazing time at Ken's apartment! 
It was located perfectly - just a short walk from everything we needed, it was close to the subway, and the place had everything we needed.
 
Ken was the perfect host, and provided all the info we could need and was super helpful when something went wrong with our reservation. 

I would recommend everyone to stay at his place!

Our stay in Ken's apartment was great, the neighbourhood and the location of the apt are just fantastic. Communication with the host was quick and easy, we even received a list of his favorite spots of the city, highly recommended!

This is the most beautiful house in the hood :) Ken's place is nice! Ken was very responsive and arranged place at he same day when I requested. Location is perfect, many nice cafe's around. A short walk to Bedfrod L station.

Thank you!

The apartement is nicely located in a quiet side street of busy Bedford Ave, where you can find all kinds of food (trucks), shops, bars etc. Only one stop away from Manhattan by metro, this makes a great starting point for your NY trip. The apartment itself is spacious and nice - recommended!
One of the best, reliable and fastest communications I had with an Airbnb host. The location is perfect and if you are no bathroom lover the apartment is just great!

My girlfriend and me stayed in Ken's apartment for one week. We found the apartment in perfect condition, clean and tidy, like in pictures. The apartment is equipped with everything is needed during our staying. 
The location also very nice and quite. Nearby a lot of nice places where take a drink, coffee and have dinner. The subway station for Manhattan is also at a few minutes walk distance. The host is really responsiveness to the emails. He provided detailed information about the apartment before our arrival.

Overall, we had a really great experience and we suggest this location to anybody.

Alessandro

Ken was a brilliant host. Two days after we left the apartment, we noticed that we had forgotten our passports in Kens apartment. He was super helpful and met up without any problems. We are super thankful about this. The instructions we got before and during our stay was super. The apartment is a bit bigger than it looks in the ad, but also a little bit more dark since all windows are facing a backyard. During our stay the temperature was about 36 degrees celsius (96 fahrenheit) and the AC didn't manage to keep the temperature down and was a bit loud (if you are a light sleeper this might be a problem).
The neighbourhood is very nice, and its close to all types of convenience stores, bars, restaurants and we really recommend the cinema "Nitehawk" and the bar Skinny Dennis. Over all this is a perfect spot if you want some action without the Manhattan hysteria! Ken was great. The recommendations he emailed us before our stay was splendid!

Ken was very nice and help a lot with the check in and out. 
The neighborhood is the best, really. All is near the  apartment: Whole Foods, restaurants, bars, and the Williamsburg bridge. 
The apartment was nice with all you need. The highlight was the bedroom. The only down side for us was the bathroom and the fact that's at all day no light come to the appartement (only on the bedroom).

Ken's place is great. The location was awesome and the apartment is really nice and really clean with everything you need. Ken was a really good host - very responsive and helpful for any questions you have on getting places or just what to do in the area in general. Highly recommend staying here!

Nice location, Ken was helpful and really responsive to every doubts that I had. The apartment is small but cozy and has everything you need to enjoy your stay in New York.
Coffee machine was a plus really appreciated!
Thank you again
Alessandro

We had an excellent stay at Ken’s place! 

The location was really close to Bedford Avenue - near great restaurants, bars, cafes, supermarket etc. Williamsburg is a great spot to explore and it’s really easy to pop over to Manhattan, with two subway stops closeby.

Ken was a responsive and attentive host. The apartment was very comfortable, clean and homely, with everything you could want.

Would definitely stay again!

He is a very good and very friendly host. 
It has all the services . a nice home

Chris is a charming and attentive host. His place is very comfortable and homey, and very well located. You can tell that he puts time and effort into making the most out of the living experience in the apt. Would def recommend.

I had a really great stay at Chris's place, the room was clean and comfy. The place is located in nice area where you can find anything you need by walk and have an easy and fast access to downtwon.  Also Chris was a great and friendly, I recomande the place without hesitating

name: Executives Den - Suite 3 - Buxton House
summary: Buxton House - Suite 3 - is a cosy self contained private double room, en suite, kitchen and eating area. Large windows give a lot of light. You will enjoy the Sydney city terrace living in quality. Located in the heart of Redfern and a 15 min walk to sydney CBD.  ⚒ New bathroom and huge kitchen for state of the art inner city living ⚒ Smart 32"TV ⚒ Central location! 5-10 min walk to surrounding inner city suburbs of Surry Hills, Newtown, Chinatown ⚒ Great food dining and bars venues
space: Redfern Street runs eastward from the Redfern railway station and 500m down the road The Buxton House is one of six brick Victorian Terrace houses of two stories. The house is zoned under conservation heritage and if only walls could talk this house would no doubt have some notorious under belly stories to tell. We founded this house neglected, run down and decrepit but saw beauty within its colonial Architraves, Kauri Pine and Red cedar stair case, Sandstone window sills and natural Victorian Charm which led us to our restoration to its former colonial glory. Redfern over the past couple years has seen a revival and is now starting to establish itself with some world class bars and restaurants. Upon arrival we have put together a welcome book containing our favourite recommendations all tested personally first hand.
description: Buxton House - Suite 3 - is a cosy self contained private double room, en suite, kitchen and eating area. Large windows give a lot of light. You will enjoy the Sydney city terrace living in quality. Located in the heart of Redfern and a 15 min walk to sydney CBD.  ⚒ New bathroom and huge kitchen for state of the art inner city living ⚒ Smart 32"TV ⚒ Central location! 5-10 min walk to surrounding inner city suburbs of Surry Hills, Newtown, Chinatown ⚒ Great food dining and bars venues Redfern Street runs eastward from the Redfern railway station and 500m down the road The Buxton House is one of six brick Victorian Terrace houses of two stories. The house is zoned under conservation heritage and if only walls could talk this house would no doubt have some notorious under belly stories to tell. We founded this house neglected, run down and decrepit but saw beauty within its colonial Architraves, Kauri Pine and Red cedar stair case, Sandstone window sills and natural Victorian Charm which
neighborhood_overview: Redfern is a real eclectic diverse mix of characters which makes for a fascinating never boring neighborhood. Our journey restoring the Buxton House has allowed us to meet and befriend the local community. Our neighbours have been so friendly and welcoming to our new presence on the street. The Redfern people are down to earth and from my experience very welcoming.
notes: All Linen is of Hotel Quality. 100 percent cotton towels and hand towels and Bed Linens is at a high Thread count. On arrival please read the welcome book which contains important information and recommendations that have been tried and tested. PARKING - generally pretty good for an inner city suburb. 1-2hr parking on Redfern street and 4hr parking limit on Chalmers street with no machines. If you drive to the back streets you will be able to find all day parking. Strictly NO Smoking in all Suites or balcony. A strict cleaning fine will be asked for if guests smoke inside rooms. However if you would like to smoke please feel free to smoke out the back in BBQ common area or out the front of the house.
transit: Buxton House is 500m from Redfern station or around the same distance to Central station. Cleveland street has bus's that take you all over sydney. Redfern station is the hub of all lines and all trains stop here. The eastern suburbs line will take you to bondi junction, which makes getting to the beach super easy. 8ks to the beach
access: Your Suite has its own bedroom kitchen and bathroom eating area completely yours. Common hallways are shared along with the laundry and back bbq area.
interaction: Buxton House was designed to be personal however incorporate zero human interaction at check in and out to ensure efficiency and privacy with our state of the art security system which is keyless and cardless. We will give you the information to access upon booking. However if you do require any assistance or just want to chat about the area and place we would be more than delighted to make your aquaintance.
house_rules: NO SMOKING - if smoking in room or on the balcony a 100 cleaning fee will be charged.

host.host_about: Originally from Sydney Australia. Have lived in London.  Love travel, food and triathlon. Great to meet you!

reviews.comments: I would definitely recommend this to everyone who still has doubts and is looking through the reviews. There are so many good experiences that I don’t even know where to start. But let’s start with Charles, he is super accommodating and friendly. The communication with Charles is very warm and efficient, and he is also a responsible host who really cares. And the location of the house is very convenient. It’s close to everything I need plus, so many good restaurants and pubs  which I don’t really need during weekdays, but if you are a foodie, then......The house itself is clean, tidy and comfortable to stay at. I would say it feels like home, apart from my home is never this clean... All in all, I would come back again if I have the opportunity.

A lovely, obviously newly refurbished apartment in a good location. My boyfriend and I wanted a space close to public transportation and this fit the bill perfectly. 

Really clean, nicely decorated, fully stocked with the essentials, and a criminally plush bed. The shower is also amazing and the host picks really nice soap! 

The host Charles was always very friendly and prompt with communication. 

The unit isn’t large, but for a short term stay and for a couple, it’s more than enough.
I would definitely recommend!
Expect a clean, modern and cosy home in a great location!
Excellent facilities, comfort, and location
Great value and very tidy!
Great place, was just as much a pleasure as the first time!

We both had an amazing stay the the Buxton House and really loved the Scandi-styled interior. Very clean and minimalistic! The place itself was cosy in the back of the house - it is an elongated kind of area, so could be quite hard to get things moving around. Nevertheless, we made it around comfortably. 

Neighborhood is safe, albeit hearing stories about walking at night around Refern. We had no troubles walking back to the apartment at about 11pm. 

There are lots of coffee and food options opened in the day and Buxton House is really close to Sydney Central with various methods there. Really loved the place and would definitely stay again when we're back in Sydney!
I worried redfern is dangerous. But it is safety.

Nice, clean and cozy studio. Great location- approx 5min walk to bus station and 10 min walk to Redfern train station. Check-in and check- out instruction was clear and simple. Charles was very quick and helpful with messages. We had a wonderful stay! Thank you Charles :)
Awesome location, nice decor, comfy bed.  What more could you want!
Always a pleasure to stay, check in and out is so easy, brilliant location, clean, fresh and my new home away from home.

We really enjoyed staying at this apartment. It’s located in a cool district, very close to all sights. The apartment is clean, there is everything that you may need, we had a great time and I definitely can recommend this place to all  The communication with Charles was good, I received answers to all my questions quickly.
A clean, light and modern apartment within reasonable walking distance of the city centre. A little on the cosy side, but perfectly comfortable!
Close to public transport, shops and resotos, Wollies and more. Best cooking utensils of any place I have stayed. Great host!!
Great place to stay, and Charles is responsive and easy to coordinate with. Thank you!
Excellent stay as per usual thanks again
responses quickly and very hospitable

Fantastic location. Redfern and Central station are both an easy walk away. Many good bars and restaurants nearby. Unfortunately the WiFi in flat 3 doesn’t work. Otherwise excellent. Charles is a quick responder to any queries.
Very nice and clean apartment. We enjoyed our stay a lot and can highly recommend this place!
Charles’ place is clean and location is fantastic! Parking on street is available as well, highly recommended for any travelers

Notre séjour de 3 nuits pour 2 amies étaient parfait. Le lit est super confortable, Charles répond rapidement à ses messages et lorsqu'il manquait quelque chose, nous l'avions le jour même. Un bel endroit tranquille et bien situé pour visiter Sydney :) merci encore Charles!

We enjoyed our stay at Charles place in Redfern.  Unit is in a great location for both Sydney CBD, Redfern, Surry Hills, Waterloo and access to the Airport.  

Unit was spotlessly clean throughout and communication from Charles was excellent at all times.  Keyless access system works well and provides great security.

Although a comfortable stay, the unit is small with no seating area other than 2 small stools in the kitchen, this wasn't a surprise to us as its clearly shown and stated in the listing but could pose problems for longer stays or days where the weather dictates you need to be inside!

Would stay again for 1 or 2 nights when in Sydney.

We enjoyed our stay in Buxton house.
- Charles was very efficient in replying and accomodating our request of luggage drop off and early check in.
- Unit was spotlessly clean, strong shower, good quiet AC and has basic utensils needed in the kitchen. 
- Location is perfect for going around as it’s approx 3minutes to the closest bus stop and 20mins to central cbd; woolworths is around the corner for your grocery needs; cafes and pubs within the vicinity.
- The check in was smooth and secure. Even though the house seems fully booked, we can hardly hear any noise in our unit. It’s also secured as CCTV cameras are around the exterior of the apartment.
The space was so cute! The host was very easy to communicate with and the check-in process was super efficient!
Nice place, super easy check in.
Very nice place and would recommend it to anyone looking a Place to stay at Redfern.
great place, great location!

I booked our 4 apartments for my family to visit for my birthday -
Great central location - a stroll from Redfern station - close to Parks , shops ,minutes from bars and restaurants - set in the village atmosphere of Redfern , so close to city - walk everywhere and enjoy the array of food in the neighbourhood 
Miny apartments , great air con & bed with fresh linen - glam touches - big private bathroom - TVs 
Would recommend and stay again
It's a very nice place and very well situated. Charles allowed us to leave our luggage in the backyard for a couple of hours after our check out. We'd stay there again!

Great Location. Prompt assistance and communication from Charles. Excellent wifi. Quiet accommodations close to all the fun spots. Supermarkets within walking distance. Train station just down the road.
Great location, the host was easy to get in touch with!
Perfect place to discover Sydney. Very clean and comfy.
Beautiful and cozy place. Cafes and restaurants are just nearby. Great place to stay:)
Clean and neat, in a good location close to good coffee and transport into CBD.

We didn’t have a very good stay here unfortunately. The place was tidy we just think the cleaning of the place needed improvement. There were makeup stains and grubby marks on the pillows and doona cover, little spiders on the ceiling throughout the house, hair on the pillows, doona cover and throughout the bathroom on the shower walls and on the toilet. It was very uncomfortable and we were glad we only booked one night. If it was cleaned properly it would have been a great place to stay.
Second time was just as lovely as our first.

house_rules: - Late check in fee HK$200 will be applied between 21:00-00:00 and HK$300 after 00:00. - Check in time need to be fixed and noticed 24 hours before you check in.  - Check out (with all luggages) before 10:00am sharp is needed. compared to other hotels, houses, It is more cheaper and has huge space. Transportation is convenient, but it is far from the main attractions. anyway I strongly recommend.

住起来该是可以的,地理位置不错｡
Great place in a great location!
很好的房东 热情 位置方便 空间大
Fion was a great host, offered us plenty of local knowledge that made our trip memorable! The location is perfect and the place itself is exactly what we needed! Can thank Fion enough!
Nice, clean, big place in a central location. There were 8 of us and the apartment's space was very comfortable. Great, fast communication with Fion. Easy check in and check out.

Clear instructions from Fion for checking-in and out. Her place was very accessible. Turn left towards Wanchai MTR station, and turn left to lots of eating places at Causeway Bay. Her place is very near the infamous Kam’s Roast Goose – Hong Kong’s Michelin Starred Roast Meat Restaurant, at Hennesy Road (just a street behind). But we had kids with us and they were too tired to queue for 45mins for any kind of food, haha! 

We usually went out about 10am in the morning and came back at night. Loads of dining choices for us, including little cha chaan teng (literally: 'tea restaurant') , dim sum, Japanese, Malaysian, Seafood, and Italian cuisines. There were convenience stores like 7-Elevens, OK and Circle Ks every 100+metres....even a 24-hr McDonalds!

Her apartment is spacious by Hong Kong standards. We enjoyed the Queen-sized beds in one bedroom and the living room (most apartments offer double beds, which is super single by Malaysian standards). Her place was hygienic and there were clean towels and linens. Just note that you would need to switch on the heater for hot water and wait approximately 15 minutes for the water to heat up. Although there were shops on the ground floor, there weren't any noise at all, not even in the day time. Most of them were hardware shops and tiles shops and they were closed by the time we came back from dinner. So we all had restful sleeps.

Her place is very accessible with MTR stations, trams and buses. Tram rides were fun and they run daily from early morning until midnight. No matter how far you travel, each tram ride costs the same flat fare and exact change is required if you are paying by cash. All trams accept Octopus cards. You need to get on the tram at the back and then pay the exact fare at the front when you're getting off. Cheapest transport at  HK$2.3 (adults) and HK$1.2 (for kids 3-11yrs).

Thanks, Fion, for a pleasant stay in Hong Kong, and for your quick responses.

Cheers
The Wees

Fion is hospitable and accommodative, the place is definitely of great value for its number of people it can house along with an amazing location with mtr closeby and great eateries! there is stable and good wifi as well! definitely recommend if you are staying in HK!

It is considered huge in the town. Went with 8 of my family members + 1 infant. All felt comfortable and cozy. Near to all public transport. 13 minutes walk to Causeway Bay Plaza and Time Square, also Islamic Centre for the Muslim. I recommend people with a group of 6 - 7 person to stay here.
Fion is very responsive and good host. Place is overpriced for its quality and location

Location is definitely great for this place. Excellent restaurants nearby and 5 mins walking distance to Causeway Bay. Large area of living as compared to other rooms in Hong Kong.
However, the room is old and furnitures are a little dirty. So don't expect the place to be as clean as a hotel. The water heater in works but not consistently and toilet floor has no drainage.
If location and room size are your main criteria, this is the place to be. Just expect the place to be a little old.

name: Serene in its Simplicity! (Room 1)
summary: Still situated within the Montreal postal code this West Island location is close enough (30-minute drive) to the scintillating downtown core yet simultaneously far away enough as a sanctuary of solitude, rest, and work with peace of mind.
description: Still situated within the Montreal postal code this West Island location is close enough (30-minute drive) to the scintillating downtown core yet simultaneously far away enough as a sanctuary of solitude, rest, and work with peace of mind. The area itself has major shopping, grocery, restaurant and entertainment spots within walking distance. If truth be told, one might actually retreat here and never need to return downtown  Right on the bus line on the major  Pierrefonds Boulevard, it is ideal for a rapid RETREAT from the hustle and bustle of the city core and a sprightly RETURN to it. The new ultramodern Pierrefonds library is right across the street.

reviews.comments: Yaw and Anyele were the best hosts. They always responded promptly to messages, and answered all questions. The room is super cute and the little chalk board with my name on it made it even more special. I really enjoyed my stay and I had the best night sleep. You can't beat the price if you're looking for somewhere quiet but still close enough to all the action. I highly recommend this airbnb. Thanks again Yaw and Anyele! :)

Yes! The living room in Yaw and Anyele's house is as beautiful in real life as it is in the photograph. Among other surprises that this amiable couple from Ghana have to offer is a full line of personal care products free of charge! This includes a toothbrush, toothpaste, and mouthwash. The cottage is a little small, but there are 2 bathrooms and the kids are well-behaved. The Pierrefonds location is not ideal, but the place is located only a 5 minute walk away from St. Jean's Boul. and the 470 bus. Yaw and Anyele are a glowing example of West Island hospitality. I strongly recommend their place.  Rating: 4 1/2 STARS  (OUT OF 5). (Website hidden by Airbnb) Ralph Cohen.  Montreal, Quebec.
