Aside from having a nice appartment at a convenient location, what comes to my mind when I think about my trip was that I met a wonderful woman! I hope I can stay in touch with her, and I wouldn't even look at other lodging options if I went back to N.Y. I highly recommend.
Best value for money set in an amazing and practical location, a fifteen minute walk from 5th  av. Jeani went out of her way to show me round and make me feel at home - she was an amazing host!

Jeani was a wonderful host and made me feel very welcome in her home, even providing me with a bottle of water when I arrived! She offered to walk me around the area on my first night, which was lovely and really helpful. The location is fantastic, very close to Central Park in one direction and Times Square in another with subway stations nearby too.
Overall, I had a wonderful time staying with Jeani and would fully reccomend it to anyone travelling to New York.

As everybody said, Jeani is such a good person, she is considered, kind, and respectful.
The apartment is clean and great location.
!!

Jeani is one of the sweetest hosts I met. And very considerate especially since it's a studio. She allowed me quite time to get work done. I would recommend her location. There were places to eat next door and a safe location as well. I will definitely stay here in the future but book fast! She books up quickly.

Jeani's warm welcome set the tone for a relaxing, comfortable  and  interesting  10 day stay.  She was always friendly  and helpful, answering my many questions .  I  would certainly  recommend  this location.  Joyce

I only have nice words to talk about Jeani .
Everything was in perfect order.  Her place, the neighbourhood , and all the descriptions she had mede me before going matched perfectly with my expectations. I very much reccommend Jeani for her kindness and hospitality and also for the neighbourhood in where she lives. All interest places are very near and it is very easy to get anywhere. I will be back to New York in a short time and I will be renting Jeani's place again withour any doubt.  In summary : I was very sastisfied and I had a very good time.
Jeani is a so nice and kind host. The house is so clean and cozy. I like it so much.
Jeani 是个超级棒的房东,她非常热情,在我入住Jeani家的四天里,她一直热心的提供给我很多帮助,还把心爱的幸运石头送给我做礼物｡她的小公寓干净而且温馨,距离中央公园只需要步行10分钟的距离｡如果能够有机会再去纽约,我一定会选择再住在她家,我也会向我的朋友们推荐Jeani的房间,能住在她的公寓里,是我此次纽约之行最棒的经历~ 非常感谢Jeani!

It was a pleasure to stay in Jeani's apartment! Regarding the apartment and location - The studio space has been nicely divided by a cupboard and screen to give some privacy to the sleeping space and Jeani gave me space to put my things. The outside traffic noise is quite loud but hey, it's Manhattan, what else would you expect!? The apartment is about a 10-15 minute walk to the closest subway station, right next to Central Park, and I walked alone there myself both day and night and felt safe. Actually, the first day Jeani walked there with me to show me the way which was lovely.
Regarding the host - Jeani was very hospitable. She was very friendly and welcoming, and gave me plenty of tips for getting around the city and things to do and see. We had some lovely conversations and I really enjoyed my time staying her. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Jeani!

This was my first time to New York as a solo traveller and Jeanie made me feel very welcome and at ease in a new city. She is not only a great host, but she is now also a good friend too. Her knowledge of the city is extensive and she is more than happy to hand out tips you might not get in your typical guide. Like many New York apartments her place is cosy; but it is also very central, clean and tidy and i would be more than happy to stay with her again. Overall a wonderful experience. Thank you Jeanie for helping make my first few days in New York so welcoming and comfortable.

Jeani is lovely, very sweet and accommodating. She gave lots of suggestions on where to go and what to visit and was very flexible with hours which I thought was fantastic. The apartment is centrally located and it's easy to get almost anywhere. Walking distance to Times Square and Central Park and close to various subway lines. 
Overall had a great time getting to know Jeani and staying there in NYC. Would stay again on a next visit.
Jeani es una gran anfitriona. El departamento es confortable y calido.

Jeani is a great host! My flight got delayed and I arrived her house at 11pm, but she waited me patiently. She welcomed me with a warm smile and she even prepared a big bottle of water and tower for me! She gave me tips on how to travel to my conference. I also have my own shelf to put my stuff. She's also really understanding with my time. She never complains even though I have to wake up at 6am in the morning or sleep late at night to do my research. SHE'S SUPER AWESOME!!! Will definitely recommend my friends to stay at her place. The location is really convenient too. There are Chinese and Indian restaurants just beside the apartment!

Jeani was the absolute perfect host!  She was able to accommodate my arrival even though she had prior plans for the evening and was more welcoming than I ever could have imagined.  I couldn't have asked for a better first airbnb experience.  Thank you so much Jeani!

Jeani is a very nice & graceful lady.  She is very tolerant to the guests. Also she took me to the high line and Chelsea market, which I appreciated a lot! Thank you, Jeani ! I will definitely recommend this place for any single lady travel NYC alone. The location is perfect you can't ask for a better place given the money you spent. Time is everything in here. Save more time on sightseeing in stead of in metro.
Jeani is a warm person, she welcomed me at 11 pm due to the delay of flight, and her flexibility and understanding really helps me a lot during this trip !

Jeani was a delight!  I feel as if I have a new friend. She was above all thoughtful and courteous.  As well as detailed and quick to communicate.  The description was accurate and exactly suited to what I needed for the weekend.  Thanks Jeani!
I stayed at Jeani's home again, it is definitely wonderful place to stay if you are planning to go to NYC. She knows everything about NYC and I highly recommend her place!

Aunque solo estuve dos noches con Jeani, fue una estancia muy agradable, cómoda y céntrica para las atracciones de NY. Jeani es una anfitriona muy carismática! It was a pleasure to stay in Jeani's cozy department! :)

Jeani is very sweet, and definitely delivers on what she is offering. She made me feel very welcome, and was very helpful with getting places and recommending where to go. I was usually out in the city the entire day so I used the shared space only for sleeping during the nights, and I found the bed comfortable.

Jeani is so welcoming and helpful. She gave me great recommendations about places to go in NYC, and she is an interesting person to talk to. The apartment is very clean and the bed is so comfortable. It has a great location, and is close to subway. Thanks so much for hosting me! Jeani really makes my time in NYC a great one :)

彼女はとても親切なﾎｽﾄで､旅やﾆｭｰﾖｰｸに慣れていない人に特におすすめしたいです｡私は海外旅行が初めてで緊張していましたが､彼女は温かく迎え入れて町を案内してくれました｡観光の際に役立つｱﾄﾞﾊﾞｲｽもたくさんくれましたし､私の上手ではない英語も一生懸命きいてくれたので､とても助かりました｡彼女の部屋に宿泊することができて本当によかったです｡
部屋は清潔でかわいらしい部屋です｡立地条件もよく､ﾌﾞﾛｰﾄﾞｳｪｲで夜にﾐｭｰｼﾞｶﾙを観たりしても､女性が一人で歩いて帰ってくることができます｡また､部屋に洗濯機はありませんが､近くにあるｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰを利用することができました｡

Jeani is very hospitable and friendly. I stayed in her apartment for 7 days and felt like I'm at home. Jeani showed me all necessary places around her place and shared advices where to go. Location of her apartment is excellent! Everything is so close to her. I felt all the time that I'm not a comfortable guest as sometimes I worked at night or came back late, but she never complain at me and always was polite and friendly :)) Jeani you are a wonderful person, thank you so much for that great week in NY!!

Jeani is a absolute treasure, the place is greatly located. Clean and full of natural light. I would stay there anytime again with pleasure bcoz of host and place. It was just a few minutes walk to time warner building and everything from restaurants etc at your doorstep. And walking distance for me everywhere else thank you Jeani for a great stay.!! God bless

I stayed in her apartment and felt like I'm at home. Jeani showed me many things around her place and shared advices where can I go. Her house's location is amazing ! Everything is so close to her apartment. She is so nice and friendly that I can totally enjoy my trip :)
Thanks for your help, i really happy i can live in your home and share many things with you

Jeani is an amazing person. She made me feel right at home. Her apartment is in a very good neighborhood close to Central Park and multiple eateries. It is a very cozy place, and Jeani made me feel like I'm staying with a friend. She was very helpful and guided me about all my NYC queries and showed me around on the first day. I am looking forward to staying with her again whenever I come back to New York !
Very nice:).thanks for taking care of me.

The location is perfect. I walked everywhere. Jeani made me feel very welcome right away, and was very helpful with getting places and recommending where to go.  I  was there for a week and have learned so much from Jeani. She made my trip to New York even more special. I couldn’t thanks her enough.

Jeani made me feel very welcome from before I even booked the trip.  She's so positive, understanding and a great host.  She will talk to you if you are in the mood or leave you alone if you don't keep talking.  She's full of information about the city as well as holistic health.  I learned a lot from her from one day! :)  Very easygoing, I went in and out as I needed with a set of keys.  The location was great, 15 min walk to central park!  I was so happy I got to enjoy so  much of central park.  And accessible to all the diff Metro lines.  I really enjoyed getting to know Jeani and staying with her.
jeani 人特别好 也特别温柔 我在纽约天天迷路她就说有困难就cell 她 而且她知道许多地方 她是素食主义者 第一天我没注意就带了楼下的肉pizza上去 她也没有说什么 而且特别温柔 嗯 真的很感谢她提供床位给我 我后两天几乎都是12点以后到家的 虽然她睡了 但是她依旧还是会给我留灯真的人很好
Jean was a great host.  She made me feel at home & gave me information about the neighborhood.

I had such a wonderful experience in NYC, and I couldn't have done so without the genuine host of Jeani! Jeani is caring, mindful and a friend who will add memorable moments to your trip. The apartment itself is artistic, historical and comfortable, it can give you some unique local experience and the location is a plus! Overall, you will have a great time staying with Jeani in her lovely apartment and I highly recommend her! :)

Jeani is the perfect host. I had some long days in NYC and she wasn't bothered at all that I was getting ready at 6am in the morning or that I wasn't coming in until midnight when she was already in bed. She is a very genuine person and even wanted me to let her know when I arrived safely back in Phoenix. Five Stars!

It was my first time that i traveld newyork and i stayed in their house. It was great! Jeani was so sweet and kind. The room was so clean, warm and cozy. It was the best house ever. I loved it so much. i will never forget there. i'm hoing to go there again soon. Thank you for everthing. I really had a beautiful time in NYC. Hope to see you again. Take care.

What is there not to like about Jeani and her accommodation?! It felt like I was visiting a friend - from the very beginning she was very responsive, caring and helpful. As soon as I walked through that door she was so welcoming and kind, always eager to tell/show you great spots around NYC that no tourist would ever find. I felt like I made a great friend - we went out for drinks, to the North of Manhattan up to the Cloisters and even went out for dinner on my first night there. Her home is very big for a NYC apartment - plus a shower, an awesome bed and a LIFT that is a slice of heaven. The location is incredible - only 2 avenues from the subway (Columbus Circle), Central Park and a glorious Whole Foods. If you don't book here, you will definitely miss a gem in both accommodation and friend. See you soon Jeani!!
Jeani is a very nice person. She gave me a lot of informations about the city and all the time we talk just like old friends.  Nice memory for me.

Jeanie was welcoming and helpful. Her home is filled with great energy and positivity. She lives and has deep roots and love for her city that shows through. The bed was comfortable and the space was clean and within walking distance to the best places to enjoy the city.

Her place was awesome to live in the decos of the house was neat and Jeannie herself is a REAAAAALLLY kind person! She gave me lots of advice in what to do in NY and recommended the Morgan Library and the Strands which was truly enjoyable!!!! She helped me a lot,  I really appreciate it. I would definitely chose to live in her place if I'll visit NYC again!!!

她真的超级友好,临走前还给我带了几块美味的饼干;早上也请我吃英式Muffin!而且真的像家人一样,关心的很全面,让我一天之内(科科我也只带了一天)完全了解到纽约的各种交通工具怎么运营!

Jeani is just a wonderful hostess.  As others have mentioned she meets you and makes you feel welcome.  She provides you with a large bottle of water when you arrive, shows you around, and makes you feel like a very special person.  Her apartment is charming and comfortable.  Despite the fact that it  is shared space, there is a screen that provides privacy.  I was comfortable and slept well. The elevator and the amenities (air conditioning, clean and spacious bathroom, use of kitchen area, storage,, comfortable bed) make it convenient and easy.  Additionally, the location is great - easy to get to Times Square, Central Park, the subway, etc.  I used Uber and the mid-town location saved me in transportation costs.  Jeani is very pleasant and connecting with her is easy.  I will  choose Jeani's on my next visit to the City.

Jeani ist die perfekte Gastgeberin. Ich kam erst gegen 1 Uhr nachts bei ihr an und wurde trotz der späten Zeit sehr freundlich empfangen. Das Appartement liegt sehr günstig fußläufig zum Central Park, Lincoln Center uvm und mit guter Metro-Anbindung.
Obwohl man sich das Studio teilt hat man einen privaten Bereich. Außerdem kann man die Küche mitbenutzen. Das Bad ist geräumig. Nach 10 Tagen Aufenthalt bei Jeani war es ein Abschied von einer Freundin.
Alles in allem absolut empfehlenswert, auch in Bezug auf das Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis. 
Thanks Jeani!!

Jeanni is extremely elegant, kind, and communicative. She invited me to join her for breakfast, gave me great suggestions to explore NYC, and lent me her umbrella.She kindly let me leave my bag in her apt even after the time I should have checked out. I genuinely appreciate this experience staying with her. 
The apartment has more than 60 years history.The building looks old, but the interior is lovely and vintage. The air conditioner can get a little loud at night but is fine once you turn the temp up. The guest space has a twin size bed, a wardrobe where I put bags and clothes on, and a screen that gives privacy.  It is not luxurious, but provides all I needed as a traveler. The streets around are well lit. It's a 10-min walk to the nearest subway stop, and then takes about 15-20 mins to get to Columbia U by subway and about the same to downtown.  
Thanks Jeanni! Will stay again!

I had a fantastic time staying with Jeani in NY. She was very accommodating, helpful and easy to communicate with prior to and during my stay. Her apartment matches the listing, is perfectly clean, comfortable and has a great location. I enjoyed chatting to Jeani and it felt more like staying with a friend than a host. Would definitely stay here again if I'm on my own in NYC!
Jeani is a very nice,warm and helpful hostess.The location is very convenient. I had a wonderful stay in her home. Thank you very much for having me,Jeani.

Jeani is an absolutely wonderful host. She treated me like a friend that she has known for awhile. The location of her apartment is very convenient to many sights NYC has to offer. I was able to walk everywhere I wanted to go. 
The apartment is small, rather clean, and well organized. I would recommend this location if you plan on exploring a lot of the city and need a place to shower and rest for the night. Jeani can also provide you with recommendations on places to eat, sights to see, and directions on how to get there.

Jeani made me feel very welcomed and to be in good hands right from the beginning. She's such a sweetheart! Her spot is located perfectly, so you can get everywere pretty easily. There's also an amazing natural food market called "Westerly" right around the corner which was a little highlight for me as a vegan! Not to mention Whole Foods at Columbus Circle. Her appartement is very clean and cozy as well.  WILL COME BACK. Thank you Jeanie!
처음 체크인할때 문자로 연락을 주고받아 문앞까지 나와주셨습니다. 맨하튼 중심이 위치한 편이어서 위치는 좋았지만 지하철역에서 걸어서 10분정도여서 처음에는 좀 불편했습니다. 또한 주인분이 여자지만 화장실문이 전혀 잠기지 않아 불편했습니다. 하지만 주인분도 친절하시고 전반적으로 만족합니다.

The stay was perfect. Jeani is a very kind and sweet host. He apartment is neat, and a room-divider gives you privacy. The bed was comfy and I was supplied with an umbrella and all the insider tips I needed. 
And the location of the apartment is perfect. It's only two blocks from Central Park and a 15 min walk from Times Square. You have several subways around, so you'll be able to explore New York just perfectly.

Staying with Jeannie was a super plus to my NYC weekend experience! Her studio apartment is just what you need for a NYC getaway. It's cozy, very surprisingly quiet and comfy. The bed arrangement with space for all your stuff is perfect. The bathroom is spacious and everything is ultra clean. The studio is perfectly located, so close to everything!!!! I went walking to almost everywhere. Two blocks from the central park and columbus circle. I used to walk to the central park and then grab a citibike. It was perfect!!!
Jeannie was much more than a super host!!!! She is very kind, makes great suggestions and is an amazing person to talk to. She is very respectful of personal spaces and very accesible at the same time. She makes you feel like home. Definetly would stay with Jeannie again!!! Book it now!!!

I couldn't have met a more accommodating host in NYC! Staying with Jeani is how I've imagined all superb Airbnb experiences to be. Upon arrival, Jeani greeted me like an old friend and showed me how to work everything. I immediately felt like I was at home. Her apartment is cozy and I appreciated all the decorations she's added to personalize her space. The apartment is one of the most convenient locations in Manhattan. It's an easy jog over in Central Park and the subway at Columbus Circle (2 blocks away). There's also a downstairs pizza shop if you want a quick bite. The neighborhood is very safe and central to everything you need at all times. Highly recommended if you are visiting for vacation or business!

Note that though the room is shared, it's very big and there's a divider. Overall, Jeani's place was really exactly what I needed for a short solo trip in NY :) It was a special plus that Jeani was such a nice and sweet host!

Jeani is the best host. I felt so lucky to stay in NYC with the host like her. She was so nice, friendly and helpful. She recommended several good places and restaurants to visit. And we had lunch and dinner together. :) The apartment is really close to Central park and other famous places. Thank you for making a good memory in NYC!

Jeani is the perfect host! She is very friendly and she knows everything about the city! 
Higly recommended! 
Thank you so much Jeani! 
All the best!

Ik heb een erg fijn verblijf gehad bij Jeani. Het appartement ligt erg gunstig. Een paar minuten lopen van Central Park, op loopafstand van Time Square en de metro. Er is een lift aanwezig. Jeani is erg aardig en behulpzaam. Ze geeft tips over restaurants, plekken om te zien en hoe je er het beste naartoe kunt gaan. We zijn ook een avond samen de stad in gegaan. Ik kan dit appartement erg aanbevelen. Het appartement is niet groot wn je deelt je kamer met Jeani. Het bed en de douche zijn prima!

Jeani is a wonderful host.  She greeted me with delicious homemade soup, and made me feel welcome immediately.  She gave me many tips and advice about the city and took an interest in me and my life.  The area is so convenient to everything uptown.  I really enjoyed my stay and can't thank Jeani enough.

I had a wonderful time staying with Jeani. Leading up to my stay, Jeani was very accessible and was quick to respond to any of my questions. For e.g., she recommended the best mode of transport when travelling between LaGuardia and NYC. During my stay, Jeani provided great recommendations on restaurants, things to do, and tips on how to get around etc. I would recommend this host to anyone that is looking for a good location and a warm and welcoming host in the city that never sleeps.
Everthing's good. If i go again NY. I'll reseve again the jeani's house.
Great place to stay, good location and friendly host!

Jeani  is a great hostess,the locations of the apartment is perfect near the subway and two blocks from Central Park 
Thank you and wishes the best
Jeani is lovely. She was there to greet me and show me the lay of the land. She had water for me. She walked me to the grocery store. She couldn't have been nicer!

Amazing! Jeani is such a nice and welcoming host and was so inviting upon my arrival. She also took time to show me around which I was very grateful for since I was not familiar with the city. I don't know what I would of done without her because Jeani was so incredibly helpful giving me tips on how to navigate the city and where I should visit. She even gave me a huge bottle of water which I took everywhere walking around New York. So thankful for that water bottle! I definitely would recommend her place if you are visiting, especially if you're not familiar with this area. :)

Safe and welcomed, thats how you will feel at Jeani's place! Conveniently situated near Central Park and Columbus Circle, Jeani's place is close to metro and bus stops as well as restaurants and stores on 10th and 57th. Jeani is a very pleasant host and I would highly recommend a stay at her place!

Jeani's place was great, super conveniently located and walkable to many locations around the city! Jeani is an awesome person! Great with communication and respectful of your space and time. Great for short trips where you will be out and about a lot!

Jeani was great! She is so kind and hospitable! She told me of several great places to visit and was genuinely interested in helping me and making this the best trip possible! The location is great! You can easily walk to Times Square or catch a $5-$6 uber, and subway is about 2 blocks away. Great take out in the area as well!

This is my first time using Airbnb and I am extremely lucky to meet the host Jeani.  She made me feel like home and showed me all the information that I need to know during the stay. I had great time there.  Thank Jeani for everything!!

Jeani's place was perfect for my long weekend in New York. I still can't get over this great price for such a killer location! And she is honestly such a sweet person and gave me plenty of space and privacy. Highly recommend!
the apt is not very clean, but ok. value for money. the host is helpful and hospital.

Jeani is one of the top five most special people I have met in my 66 years' living. She took me under her wing there in the big, scary (for this Atlantan) Big Apple, and turned my visit there into a cozy, homey, few days filled with good conversation, plenty of food, and, surprisingly, lots of R&R.
As a hotel employee, I had options available to me at employee rates at several NYC properties. I booked there initially, to stay while I attended a much looked-forward-to event.
I then decided, just for exploring options, to peruse what offerings were available on Airbnb. That's when I found Jeani's place. Turned out, her place was literally across the street from my event's venue.
Delightful experience. So glad my decisions led me to Jeani's door.
Now back in Atlanta, I show everyone I can pictures of my time at Jeani's.
If I ever go back to NYC, you can know I'll be calling upon Jeani again.
Loved this stay, so easy and pleasant. Jeani was very accommodating and I had no problems going about my business!
It was just what I needed for this trip. Close to my conference and a comfortable clean space.

Great host! Very friendly and welcoming, willing to give you all sorts of tips about NY, but also in the background to let you do your own thing (you sleep in the same room with her, but she created sort of a wall, and just let me have my own planning of the day, without interfering). Very nice location as well, close to public transport!
Jeani's place is so cozy, and it's a great location. Super close to a lot of good pizzerias and subway stations. Jeani makes you feel right at home in the big city!

Jeani is a lovely and generous host. She respects your privacy but is also nice to chat with and always happy to provide advice or a friendly conversation. She has created a divider that allows you to have your own space. The bathroom is spacious and the shower is great. My favorite thing about this place was my ability to walk anywhere I was interested in going. It's right next to the John Jay College of Criminal Justice, Columbus Circle, numerous places to eat, and it was a 20-25 minute walk to the theatres. It's also near a subway station and if you're going through Newark International Airport, it's a super easy trip using the subway and NJ Transit. I know that I wanted to incentivize myself to go out and explore the city and this place was the perfect spot to change, sleep, and shower, so I could prepare for the next event. I would definitely stay with Jeani again. Truly a great experience.

Jeani offers a safe and secure nest in a great NYC location. I stayed for 3 nights and was totally comfortable. Close to metro and her building has a lift. Great a/c and shower. She is the heart of NYC. She'll be my "NYC go to" in the future.
센트럴파크와 링컨센터가 가까운, 뉴욕에서는 비교적 조용한 동네에서 묶고 싶었던 저에게는 참 좋은 선택이었습니다. 오래된 아파트이지만 관리가 잘되어있고 아주 깨끗하며, 호스트 Jeani의 진심이 느껴져서 참 좋았습니다.
Place is small and cosy and is walking distance to subway and some tourist attractions. Host is kind and brought me around on the first  day to familarize with the area.

Jeani's place is in the perfect location within walking distance of a lot of the major attractions and she was an amazing host. I would recommend staying with her if you ever have the opportunity. This is a great location for a first time visit to New York!

Jeani was a wonderful host and friend during my stay. The room was interesting with antique pieces throughout and definitely reflected her personality and taste. The bed was comfortable and the whole unit was clean. While I was here, I used the subway once. I was so central that I could walk everywhere I needed to.
Jeani made me feel very comfortable and welcome despite sharing the apartment with her without a separate bedroom. The place was spotless and comfortable.

Jeani was really helpful from the moment I booked her. She accompanied me to AT&T when I needed a data SIM. She was also kind enough to keep my luggage in her apartment until late afternoon.  The closest subway station from her apartment is just 15 minutes walk away (59th St - Columbus Circle). The minor issue I had during my stay was that the lock on her bathroom is broken. Consequently, there was a couple of times when she walked in on me. Other than that, I would totally  recommend Jeani to fellow travelers.
Jeani is a lovely host and her apartment is beautiful. Thumbs up!

Jeani is an excellent host and her studio apartment is perfect for a solo traveller. The location is central and going to uptown or downtown is pretty easy from here. Central Park is at walking distance and so is Hudson River. Public commute is also easily accessible. Jeani is a sweet person and her apartment is very artistically decorated. She is very kind to offer breakfast and any help required. Though you don't have a separate room, she has placed a good divider in the room to get privacy. The apartment is also safe. If you are travelling solo, then this is the place you must stay on visit to NYC.
Agar koi aur jagah itna paisw mein multi hai toh please yeh jagah bilkul mat lena
Jeani was such an amazing host. She made me feel so comfortable and she was so accommodating. I will definitely come back to NYC to stay with her!

Fantastic location and just as Jeani said it would be. My flight was cancelled several times, and I had to keep changing my arrival time. Jeani was very responsive and accommodating with all my updates and modifications. Once I arrived, she was very helpful with information and NYC tips and tricks!

Jeani is a gracious and friendly host.  She's there to interact if you wish, yet also respects your privacy.  She makes good use of space in her apartment.  Her location is walking distance to shops, theaters, restaurants and transit.
Thank you for your thoughtfulness Jeani!
Jeani is very kind and accommodating and her place is very nice situated within walking distance to so many attractions and to the subway. Would definitely stay again.

Ich war sehr gerne bei Jeani! Man sollte sich bewusst sein, dass es ein Ein-Zimmer-Appartment ist und man daher im gleichen Raum schläft. Jeani lässt einem aber Privatsphäre und hat das Zimmer durch einen Raumteiler geschickt getrennt. Die Klimaanlagen bläst direkt auf das Bett, aber es war überhaupt kein Problem für Jeani diese auszuschalten. Jeani selbst ist super nett und aufgeschlossen und sehr interessiert daran, die Leute kennen zulernen. Zum Abschied hab ich sogar Schokolade von ihr bekommen.  Ich kann es nur empfehlen bei Jeani zu übernachten!

Jeani's place is a wonderful place to stay while in NYC.  Not only are you close to Central Park, Times Square, great shopping, museums, parks, restaurants, and other exciting things about NYC, you have the benefit of a safe and comfortable place to stay.  Jeani is a delightful and warm person with an interesting studio apartment that invites you to look at her artwork, collections,, and furniture.  She is a caring hostess who pays attention to your needs and make you feel valued.  This was my second stay with her; I'm sure I will be back again.

Jeani is very kind and nice. She will be happy to help you everything. The apartment location is great! Having nice four nights here!

Jeani是一位非常热情的房东｡你有任何问题都可以问她｡虽然是共享一个房间,但她用屏风和柜子最大限度地给予了住客私人空间,非常地贴心,你不会有任何的不适｡公寓的位置非常好,离地铁站两个街区｡综合而言,性价比超高!强烈推荐｡
Jeani's place is quite comfortable and clean.  She is very inviting and friendly.  She goes out of her way to make you feel welcomed.

First of all please note that I could spend the whole day writing on how nice jeani is. It was a pleasure sharing the 1 room apt. with her, she is very caring and thoughtful and ready to help you getting around the city.
The place too is very nice, on a big busy street, that means you could easily walk around also late at night feeling safe (it may be a bit noisy though), very close to a bus station that brings you to the subway but you can also easily get to the subway (local & express) in 10-15 min walk. Time Sq is 20ish mins by walk or 1-2 stops with the subway and Central Park just 10 mins walk and everything is well connected with the subway. I would definitely recommend it for its handy and safe position and for Jeani.
A lovely hostess in a small but very efficient and clean apartment.  Well located with many good eateries around.

Jeanie is just super nice. She will make you feel very welcome, and offer you everything you may need. I got a nice breakfast my first morning, tea, I got cream for my sore muscles and nail polish remover and she always asks if you need anything. She is also great to ask for restaurant tips etc. We got along so well. Great location, nice building.
Jeani is an amazing host! She's very sweet and she will try to make you feel at home, the space is very small and the building is getting old, but this place is good for a weekend trip.
Jeani is a great host.  Very helpful!

Jeannie is truly a delight.  She completely made me feel at home in her property.  It was quaint, cute, and clean. Even in a studio, her set up gave us both plenty of privacy.  The location was perfect, lots of restaurants and so much to see and an easy walk to other locations in Manhattan.  This was my first shared bnb experience and my introverted self was anxious, but it was an outstanding experience.  I would stay here again without hesitation.
Jeani is very kind, gracious and respectful. She is a wonderful host and her apartment is located minutes from the best of Manhattan. As a former New Yorker, I highly recommend Jeani's place.
Jeani was great, her space is as described and she was very helpful and friendly. Highly recommend to single female travellers.

Staying with Jeani is like staying with your long lost best friend who happens to let you stay in her apartment while you visit. The studio is clean and air conditioned and shared and it's a home not a private hotel but as long as you're open to a space that is lived in and accustomed to roommates then you get an awesome location, with an awesome apartment and walking distance to basically anything!! She also made some great recommendations for food and hang outs that were really cool and thoughtful! Will for sure stay with jeani again!!

Jeannie made me feel very welcome in her home which made it easy to share the space with her. She was always happy to help me make the most of my stay in the city which she knows very well. Her apartment is in a secure building with a lift. It was a short walk from Central Park and I had no problem walking back from Times Square in the evening. I would be happy to stay there again if I get the chance to visit New York in the future.
Jeani was a wonderfully, warm, thoughtful host.  My stay could not have been more perfect.  Thank you!
Trevlig värdinna som gjorde vistelsen till angenäm upplevelse
Jeani was such a sweet host! Convenient location and lovely place too! I enjoyed my stay very much.
Jeanis place is very centric still its pretty quiet in the night. Jeani is very attentiv and gives you good recommendations what to see in NYC. Really enjoyed to stay at her place.

Jeannie is a wonderful host. She made me feel very welcome and had great travel trips. Her apartment is very well located and just a few minutes away from a lot of major sites. I would highly recommend to other travelers.
Jeani was awesome! She was a lovely host and helpful! I would definitely stay again!

Her house is located vest. And the room is clean.
More than anything she is so kind. She've lived NYC for a long time so she taught me a lot of NYC. Thank you Jeani.
I hope to see you again!

The place is very centric, you can move easily to all another places even in the night. Very clean and homely. You can find many kind of foods in the same street. Jeani is an excellent hosting and she can give you excellent recommendations.

Jeaniはとても明るく親切な方でした｡明日の予定などを伝えると､その場所から近い観光地やお店を教えてくれて､一緒に調べたりしてくれました｡
お部屋は広くはないですが､快適に過ごせました｡通りに面しているので､夜でも怖くなかったです｡最寄りの駅から歩いても帰れるし､ﾊﾞｽが家のすぐそばで止まるので､夜はﾊﾞｽに乗って帰ることもできて安心でした｡ﾁｪｸｲﾝ､ﾁｪｸｱｳﾄの時間も柔軟に対応してもらえて助かりました｡ひとり旅でﾆｭｰﾖｰｸへ行く方にはおすすめのお部屋です｡
Jeani was a fantastic and flexible host with lots of great local recommendations. The location is perfect to walk or subway to different museums and events. I had a lovely time on my trip!

お部屋は広くはなくﾜﾝﾙｰﾑですが､真ん中で区切って､ある程度ﾌﾟﾗｲﾊﾞｼｰが保たれるように工夫されています｡
Jeaniさんは事前の問い合わせにはすばやく返信してくださり､滞在中もいろいろｱﾄﾞﾊﾞｲｽもらいました｡
毎朝､紅茶とﾏﾌｨﾝの朝食もありがたかったです｡
拙い英語でも､理解しようとしてくれます｡
場所も便利なところなのですが､通りに面しているため､夜静かでないと寝られない人はいるかもしれません｡
ただし彼女は耳栓も用意してくれます｡
一人旅やﾆｭｰﾖｰｸに初めての人にはとても良いと思います｡
This was a repeat visit, and I'll be back! Ideal location. I feel safe and secure, comfy and cozy,  and very welcome. Jeani is a doll!
Jeanie is a wonderful host! She gave a lot of tips about places where to go and things to do, the flat was super clean and cosy

I stayed at Jeani's room for 2 nights. It was amazing! I love the pretty and clean and safe room. Jeannie was a very very kind and nice person. Location was also good. There were many restaurants, cafe, pharmacy and stores around the house. I want to stay again next time I go to NY:)
とても居心地のいいJeaniさんの部屋は､観光にも移動にも立地がよく､1日の行動を相談するとｱｲﾃﾞｱをくれたり､提案してくれたりと親身になって応対してくれました｡滞在が充実したものになりました｡

Jeani’s studio apartment is in a great location, near lots of restaurants and walking distance to subway stations. Jeani is very friendly and helpful with transportation information. If you don’t mind close quarters and relative lack of privacy, this is an affordable option in a midtown Manhatten.
Jennie is sweet and helpful. The room is only devided by a small screen.

Jeanie is so warm and friendly, and chatting with her was nothing but pleasant. I was very comfortable in her space, and her presence when home was unobtrusive. The building and apartment definitely still have that 1930's feel and I loved it. Will definitely consider her for future visits to the area.

The location is amazing.  A five minute walk to Central Park and easy to walk to Times Square & subways.  I felt totally safe walking back to the apartment on my own at night.  Jeannie goes over and above with being helpful.  She walked me to the places I needed to find and looked up details of the places I wanted to get to.  She is chatty and friendly.

This is Grace, my husband booked this accommodation for me from his account, and i wasn't quite sure what to expect when i arrived. 
Jean is the warmest and kindest person you could wish for on a trip to a busy, crazy city like NY. My flight came in after midnight, and she so graciously stayed up to welcome me, and to get me all settled. She has such a calm presence and caring personality, you will feel so at home in her space.
She is also available to offer assistance and answer questions, and to provide tips for getting around too.
She is flexible, considerate and accommodating. I will definitely book her again when i am back in NY.
The location is the best! It's so easy to get around from there. It was so perfect for me!
I would strongly recommend Jeani’s place not only because of the great location but also her hospitality. I enjoyed my stay at her place!
공항에 오는 지하철의 보수 때문에 예정보다 많이 늦은 시간에 체크인을 하게 되었는데 늦은 시간까지 저를 기다리고 반갑게 맞아주셨습니다. 칸막이를 두고 원룸을 같이 쓰는 구조인데도 전혀 불편함을 느끼지 않게 배려해주셔서 즐겁게 지내다 왔습니다. 교통도 편리한 편입니다. 혼자 여행하시는 분들에게 추천합니다~
Jeani was super nice and accommodating! She is a great conversationalist and gave me plenty of my own space when needed as well!
Jeannie is a sweet woman. You’ll feel comfortable to stay with her. The apartment is next step to Central Park, walkable to Times Square. Recommend
Jeannie was wonderful! The space is lovely and very clean. Conveniently located near Lincoln Center and other performance venues. Will definitely stay again!

Jeani is such a lovely hostess. Her desire to make your stay safe, comfortable, and as private as possible in her apartment shines through.  Her vast knowledge and love of NYC  is a beakon to new travelers. She even walked me to the Whole Foods so that I knew exactly where it was, which by the way is just a short jaunt from her home. The location is wonderful, and walkable to so much of what I wanted to do. I can't say enough about the honest, loving soul that Jeani is.
The apartment is in an excellent location however unfortunately it takes more than a location to make one comfortable

Jeani was extremely helpful in showing me around and giving me tips on some great places to go eat. I just turned 17 and this was my first time traveling alone to a country with no family members nearby, but Jeanidid a wonderful job at making me feel welcome and very safe.

Would 100% recommend staying here it’s so close to Central Park and a walking distance to so many other places. Jeannie was amazing and provided a lot of helpful information. She is really friendly and it didn’t feel as if we’d just met it felt like we’ve known each other for years. Thank you so much Jeannie

Jeannie's place - and Jeannie herself - are total gems. I felt so totally welcome and comfortable. She is a lovely host, full of great information about New York, but also genuinely kind and personable. I had high expectations based on other guests' reviews, and I was not at all disappointed! Her apartment is superbly located within walking distance from Broadway theaters, Central Park, Lincoln Center, and abundant neighborhood restaurants. The bed is super comfy and she has the studio cleverly set up with plenty of privacy and storage space. 

Jeannie is a longtime resident of the neighborhood, and her comfort there helped me feel a little bit like *I* lived there, too. If you are lucky enough to book her place, you will have a much more authentic NY experience that you could ever get at a hotel!

Jeani is a wonderful host.  This is my third time visiting, and she is consistently kind and helpful.  Her studio is exceptionally clean and comfortable and the location is great.  I will return again.
It was another nice stay at Jeani’s and I would definitely go back again!
Jeannie is a lovely hostess and her place is very good! She is wonderful and accommodating, interesting and kind hearted! You will be welcomed and comfortable with Jeani!

Fantastiskt läge nära Columbus Circle/Central Park (5 min), Times Square (12.15 min) etc i ett område som kändes säkert att promenera till även kvällstid. Endast tillgänglig för kvinnlig ensamresande då värden bor där samtidigt, det är ett enda stort rum avgränsat med en bokhylla och en vikvägg så att man har sin sida av rummet. Under min vistelse var dock värden endast där dagtid så jag sov där själv. Värdens bemötande var excellent, snabbt och väldigt hjälpsam.

Jeani is a diamond in the rough of New York City. She is an awesome host and made me feel welcome and safe.  She is a great communicator and went out of her way to show me the area. I cut my stay short with Jeani only because I realised I needed my own space and privacy which was difficult in such a small, shared studio and I was staying for a few weeks. 
The location is just a walk away from Central Park and the subway and some great restaurants and wine bars. I would suggest that Jeani’s place is great for a short stay.
Jeannie was such a wonderful host. She made me feel extremely comfortable and allowed me to check-in and check-out at flexible times. Would highly recommend staying with her!
The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Stayed here once again! love the hospitality of Jeannie. I made a last minute reservation yet she was so accommodating.
Jeannie is a wonderful host and made my stay in NYC wonderful.  It's in a great location, close to Lincoln Center and Columbus Circle.  Easy to get to the subway and uptown or downtown.
Jeani是一个非常好的房东,房子的位置极佳,下次去还会住她那里~
Jeani is a super host.  It is a safe place to stay. And the location is so good.  She is kind and friendly.  You can easily get any information from her. Thank you so much, Jeani!
Jeani is a gem. So sweet and really just a pleasure.
Welcoming host. Serene studio. Great location. I hope to stay with Jeani again.

Jeani is very kind.

She loves a ballet, so she offered informations of dance studios and dance goods stores.
Because  my purpose of the trip was taking a dance lesson,
the informations was so helpful for me.

Her place was also great.
It was safe and convenient. 
I recommend her place strongly.
Thank you very much. The House is nice, and location as well. I Haven a great time there!

Great place, great location! It really is super close to so many things, plus it's close to a subway stop to access many more parts of the city! Jeani is such a great host, great hospitality and has tons of tips for things to do and places to eat!

Jeani was a very welcoming and accommodating host.  The location is perfect - easy walk to subway stations, plenty of great options for eating and drinking nearby.  It was a great choice for a single woman spending most of my time out of the apartment and needing a convenient and affordable place to sleep.  For people who are light sleepers, be aware that you should bring earplugs, as it is on a busy and noisy street.  Jeani herself is quiet and friendly, making me welcome to come and go as I pleased.

Great location for walking to Lincoln Center, Central Park, Broadway. It is a shared one room NYC apartment but Jeannie is respectful of your space and check in was very flexible as I arrived before noon. She thoughtfully provided bottled water upon arrival and could make suggestions for walking routes, coffee shops,etc.
Jeani is an excellent hostess who makes your stay very welcoming. She is very helpful with information about the city if you need it. Her place is located in a very convenient location.
Jeani é absolutamente uma grande anfitriã.  Muito gentil e pronta no auxílio dos perdidos em nova york. Foi uma estadia muito tranquila, a localização do apartamento é absolutamente incrível! !

It went wery well to share room with Jeani in her studio. Jeani is a very nice host and a very nice person. I was there and visited friends, came home late sometimes, but that was no problem. She can give good tips then she knows Manhattan well. I had nice days there.
滞在前の対応がとても素早く助かりました｡また､ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの時間ｷﾞﾘｷﾞﾘになってしまってもとても丁寧に対応していただけましたら｡何か困ったことがあれば質問すれば答えていただけ､とてもありがたかったです｡立地もよく､一人暮らし部屋を仕切ってみたというのが大丈夫なら女一人旅にはぴったりだと思います｡
Jeani is warm and welcoming!  Her place is centrally locates and convenient to so many places!

If you're traveling by yourself, like I was and if you're looking for food/travel recommendations around the neighborhood/New York, I will definitely recommend Jeani's place. She is a great host, will interact with you but at the same time, will give you privacy. 
My check-in was great as she was there to receive me and she communicates, so the check-out was hassle-free. Her apartment is well-kept and clean. I will definitely stay there for my next visit, highly recommend her place!!

Jeani' house is really great! Great location near every place I want to go. Jeani is a really kind and helpful person, her place is clean and has almost everything you need. Although we are stay in the same home, she keep my area private~
Definitely a good experience~
Es un lugar ideal para quedarse durante un viaje en NY, Jeannie es super linda y atenta. Muy recomendado

Jeani was warm and engaging without being intrusive. The space is small but perfect for what I wanted. The neighborhood has plenty to offer and the mile walk to Time Square was a great way to start my visit.
jeanie People are very good, the location is convenient for a lot of nearby food, it is also very safe, recommend her home.
Jeani很热情,回复也很迅速,还能给予各种游纽约的信息,毕竟是在寸土寸金的曼哈顿,如果只是想要有张床睡觉还是不错的,就是离地铁口有点距离.
Her house is convenient especially for the metropolitan opera! Also her hospitality and character is really great. I definitely recommend her place.

name: Cozy, Central Flat near Taksim Squere Free Wifi #2
summary: Wir begrüßen Sie in unserer Residenz im Herzen der Weltmetropole. Wir stellen Ihnen eine einzigartige, moderne und luxuriöse Unterkunft zur Verfügung.  Die Residenz befindet sich in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Taksim Platz. Die noble Umgebung Piyalepasa bietet ausreichende Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, edle Cafés und Restaurants sowie ein umfangreiches Angebot an Freizeitaktivitäten. Seien sie ein Teil davon.
space: Angekommen in Piyalepasa wird man an der Rezeption empfangen, welche stets Rund um die Uhr für Fragen und Hilfe zur Verfügung steht. Die Wohnung unterteilt sich in zwei Zimmer. Diese bietet viel Platz und Komfort für zwei bis vier Personen. Das Schlafzimmer ist mit einem King-Size Bett ausgestattet. Das Wohnzimmer bietet ebenfalls eine Schlafmöglichkeit für zwei Personen. Die Klimaanlage und die Fußbodenheizung sorgen für wohlfühlende Atmosphäre an warmen und kalten Tagen. In der Küche kann man sich durch vollständige Ausstattung kulinarisch ausleben. Die wunderbare Aussicht und Lage ermöglichen schöne, erholsame und zugleich aufregende Urlaubstage. Außerdem verfügt Piyalepasa über ein 24/7 Sicherheitssystem.

neighborhood_overview: Mit Piyalepasa wurde durch Wohnungen, Rezidenzen, Hotels, Büro’s und die Einkaufsstraße in Istanbul ein wichtiges Lebens- und Investitionszentrum geschaffen. Dabei erhöht die wirtschaftliche, soziale und kulturelle Transformation der Region den Wert der Investition.
notes: Wir können kooperieren auf den Sprachen.. - Englisch - Deutsch - Türkisch
transit: Mit seiner zentralen Lage, nur wenige Minuten von den Sehenswürdigkeiten der Stadt wie Kabataş, Nişantaşi und Beşiktas entfernt, bietet Piyalepasa einfachen Zugang zur Autobahn D-100 und den Ringstraßen, den Tunneln Dolmabahçe und Kağithane sowie dem Caglayan Courthouse und Krankenhäusern. Auch befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe Universitäten und Gymnasien.  -Beyoglu 3 Minuten - Nisantasi 7 Minuten - Metro 5 Minuten - Kagithane-  1 Minuten     Tunnel - Atatürk 20 Minuten    Flughafen - Dolmabahce 5 Minuten
access: Die gesamte Wohnung wird den Gästen zur Verfügung gestellt.
interaction: Wir als Gastgeber sind zu jeder Zeit sowohl telefonisch als auch persönlich erreichbar. Wir wohnen in unmittelbarer Nähe und wären im Falle eines Problems sofort anwesend.
house_rules: IMPORTANT SMOKING IS ONLY ON THE BALCONE ALLOWED OTHERWISE YOU BECOME A MONEY PUNISHMENT

reviews.comments: We had a very good time at Marco’s home. Super tidy and clean,very nice decorated and we had everything we needed and even more. We feel ourselves open and clear like our home. Marco and his parents are very lovely people and we enjoyed the good vibes in their home. We definitely recommend everyone to stay here! The europa side is very nice,you get a good idea about the real life in Istanbul and it's easy to get to the Asia side by ferry. Everything you need is in walking distance from Marco’s place. thank you soo much again!!

name: New apartment near city centre and shops for 4 ppl
summary: Brand new High end building situated just out side the CBD.  Fast emerging as a stylish address, Waterloo is situated on the edge of expansive Moore Park. Warehouse cafés, art galleries and designer stores are becoming the norm in a neighbourhood that still has echoes of its industrial past. With a New shopping centre just across the street, I am sure it will make your trip very convenient.
space: Brand new 1 bed room plus study, the study is big enough to put a double sofa bed. well equipped kitchen will all essentials, If you would like to cook your own meal wash machine and dryer are also included

neighborhood_overview: Danks Street has attracted some big names in the arts and design industries. High-end designer homeware stores sit alongside art galleries in repurposed warehouses and new developments. Amidst all of this is an enviable café and dining scene which offers an array of local and international flavours. With easy access to neighbouring Moore Park, a network of bike trails and Waterloo Oval, locals can enjoy the great outdoors.

host.host_about:
Hello, I'm Rui Lé Costa.
I have created this project with the aim of showing Oporto to the world.
In its multiplicity of angles, this experienced and intimate city vibrates in secret places, landscapes, stories and events. Who lives there or passes by, feel it deeply.
Then, FEELPORTO passes through the common interest of the larger community of those who inhabit the city, also in the heart.
And because Oporto is part of the heart of the north of this country, its community expands through and beyond its borders. Therefore, this project is open to all interested in approaching this sense, promoting their ideas and interests on a regular basis.
This way, it can provide all visitors experiences and emotions parallel to the usual and special itineraries. I propose, therefore, that are also the unconditional city lovers, from north to south of Portugal and beyond, to be a part of this community FEELPORTO ... Because Port is Beautiful.

neighborhood_overview: Strathfield is a suburb in the Inner West of Sydney, Australia. It is located 12 kilometres west of the Sydney central business district. Strathfield's residential landscape is extremely varied, ranging from country-style estates to high-rise apartments. Many styles of architecture have been employed over past decades, with dwellings having been constructed in Victorian, Federation, Interwar period architecture, Californian Bungalow and contemporary periods. One of the oldest surviving houses built in the 1870s is Fairholm which is now a retirement village called Strathfield Gardens. Strathfield is known as a regional centre for education.
notes: Bedroom 1 has 2 single beds. Bedroom 2 has 2 single beds. Bedroom 3 has 2 single beds. All bedrooms can be locked. Bedroom 1 is described in my listing 1. Bedroom 2 of the house is described in my listing 2.  Bedroom 3 of the house is described in my listing 3. If you are three or more people, you will have to book more than one of my listings. All listings/bedrooms can be locked for privacy.  Street is quiet.  Minimize noise after 10:30PM on weeknights. There is one parking space which is long and can fit two cars. You may have to negotiate with another driver to move the car. Please contact me if you have any questions.
transit: Train station 5 minutes walk from the house and is a very convenient way to get into the city centre or in a west direction to the Blue Mountains. If you bring your car you can park it for free at the house and then use public transport to get around.  Opal travel cards are easy to purchase.  Strathfield railway station is a major interchange on the Sydney Trains and NSW TrainLink networks and for buses serving the inner west.
access: Guest have accesses to:  • Their private room  • The other 4 shared rooms  • They have to share the bathroom and kitchen with other possible guests  • The maximum number of people that may be sharing the bathroom with you is five. This is only if the other bedrooms are rented • All guests have access to the large backyard
interaction: Host is a local with a lot of information about the area. She is best contacted by  text or email. The host is willing to help you make the most of your time in Strathfield.
house_rules: Treat the house as if it was your own, please do dishes and keep your room tidy.  If you have any issues with the other house guests I would appreciate if you tried to communicate with them first before you contact me.  The house is a shared facility and you have to work with each other.

name: Kona Ali’i 502 Oceanfront Condo
summary: Located in the heart of scenic and historic Kailua-Kona on the Big Island of Hawaii, our oceanfront condo offers you magnificent ocean views and easy walking to restaurants, shopping, historic landmarks, and water activities.  Our spacious lanai provides a panoramic view of the beautiful Pacific Ocean where you may see dolphins, colorful reef fish, turtles and the chance of a whale breeching during whale season. At day's end you'll appreciate the richly colored sunsets from this private lanai.
space: Take a leisurely walk along Ali'i Drive as you stroll in and out of shops, try a refreshing shave ice, watch the waves and make your way to the nearby pier, Home of the Ironman, where you can swim and snorkel or rent paddle boards. At night you may find live music in the many restaurants where you can enjoy a cocktail and freshly caught fish.
description: Located in the heart of scenic and historic Kailua-Kona on the Big Island of Hawaii, our oceanfront condo offers you magnificent ocean views and easy walking to restaurants, shopping, historic landmarks, and water activities.  Our spacious lanai provides a panoramic view of the beautiful Pacific Ocean where you may see dolphins, colorful reef fish, turtles and the chance of a whale breeching during whale season. At day's end you'll appreciate the richly colored sunsets from this private lanai. Take a leisurely walk along Ali'i Drive as you stroll in and out of shops, try a refreshing shave ice, watch the waves and make your way to the nearby pier, Home of the Ironman, where you can swim and snorkel or rent paddle boards. At night you may find live music in the many restaurants where you can enjoy a cocktail and freshly caught fish. Your lobby-entry key will allow you access to the pool and a bathroom off of the pool area.  There is a barbecue grill close by the pool that you may use. I
neighborhood_overview: The condo is truly in the heart of Kailua-Kona and you will not need a car while getting around in town. So much to see and do, or just totally relax on the lanai- reading, playing cards, sipping cool drinks.
notes: Two good things to know when you look at our prices: 1) The State of Hawaii requires us to charge two taxes totaling 14.42%  (GET or general excise tax is 4.167%) and (TAT Transient Accommodations tax 10.25%).  These taxes are included in our prices.  2) We offer 10% off when you stay a minimum of 7 days.
transit: We don't have useful public transportation but there are taxis, uber and some trolley that  can get you from place to place.
access: Your lobby-entry key will allow you access to the pool and a bathroom off of the pool area.  There is a barbecue grill close by the pool that you may use.
interaction: I have lived in Kona since 1974 and want you to feel this is your home-away-from home. I will do everything possible to make this a positive experience for you. You may not meet me in person but you will know I have put my personal touches in the condo when you arrive.
house_rules: - After 10:00pm- Quiet hours, especially in hallways and by elevators. Minimum rental is 7 days during the first 2 weeks of October, or Oct 1-15th.

reviews.comments: We can not wait to come and stay back at Sally’s. They have everything and more that you will need for a comfortable stay. The location and views are spectacular!
Great space and the sound of the ocean was fantastic.

This place is in such a wonderful location! We spent most of our time out on the lanai watching dolphins and drinking coffee in the morning. We were so close to our dive shop we could just pop on over. Amazingly clean and the sheets are so comfy! Every single thing has been thought about and i feel so fortunate! Plus there’s a parking spot! Ah!
Awesome location at a great value

We had a great stay at this beautiful property with convenience and fantastic ocean view from the unit.  Sally was very responsive on communication as well as to our requests. We certainly will consider coming back in the future. We could handle the noise fine although it might be something to keep in mind for people who are more sensitive.

Words cannot describe how wonderful thid place is. the host are wonderful and willing to accomodate anyway they can. the location is superb being in downtown Kona Hawaii with a fantastic view of the ocean. highly recommend staying here

We loved our stay at this condo. The location couldn’t be any better! It’s just steps to many little shops and restaurants. The highlight of the stay was being able to see whales and dolphins right off the lanai, not to mention those million dollar sunsets! The condo is stocked with helpful gear like beach chairs, a boogie board and binoculars. The kitchen is perfect for making breakfast and snacks. We also loved having the washing machine right in the condo- it was very convenient. All in all, Sally and her sister were wonderful, kind, attentive hosts who welcomed us with a basket of goodies and were prompt with responding to questions. We are already thinking about when we can return to this condo in the future.

space: The apartment has a very convenient location for all the historical and touristic parts of Istanbul.  Metrobus access: 7 min by taxi or 15min by bus. dakikada. Metrobus is a metro style bus that is a perfect transportation to avoid the traffic. We are also very close to the seaport where you can take a boat to the asian side of Istanbul by crossing the bosphorus in 30 min. Subway line (sishane stop) is only 10 min walking distance as well. We also have shuttles and buses traveling back and forth all day  which you can take it at the stop near our apartment.

summary: The Liiiving in Porto | Downtown Cosy Apartment is a charming one bedroom apartment full of natural light, all refurbished and very cosy. Located between Fontainhas and Praça da Batalha.
space: It has a bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with a large shower and a spacious living room with kitchenette, where you can prepare your meals.  Book now! Because Liiiving is easy.

It has a bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with a large shower and a spacious living room with kitchenette, where you can prepare your meals.  Book now! Because Liiiving is easy. The guests have full access to the apartment. We leave our guests at ease, but we’re available whenever they need us. You will be in a zone of the city loaded with history, typical Porto facades and with picturesque cafes and restaurants. In 250 meters you can take a stroll through the San Lázaro’s garden or to the Fontainhas’ viewpoint overlooking Rio Douro and Cais de Gaia. In a walk of less than 1 km you will reach the famous Santa Catarina Street or Mercado do Bolhão. You will have a public transport network at your door that can drop you anywhere in the city, including the beaches of Foz do Douro or Matosinhos. You ca
neighborhood_overview: You will be in a zone of the city loaded with history, typical Porto facades and with picturesque cafes and restaurants. In 250 meters you can take a stroll through the San Lázaro’s garden or to the Fontainhas’ viewpoint overlooking Rio Douro and Cais de Gaia. In a walk of less than 1 km you will reach the famous Santa Catarina Street or Mercado do Bolhão. You will have a public transport network at your door that can drop you anywhere in the city, including the beaches of Foz do Douro or Matosinhos.
notes: In order to make Porto more attractive, the municipal tourist tax came into effect. The rate of € 2.00 included in the price of stay, is for guests over the age of 13. It is charged per person and per night for a maximum of 7 nights. We have a transfer service that will leave you at the apartment! You only need to ask it (consult us for price) You can also enjoy a delicious breakfast, which can be delivered every morning in your apartment, upon request (consult us for price)

reviews.comments: Abel was a very friendly host. The flat is beautifully arranged and located well. Fully recommendable.
Nice area close to central part of the city with a lot of good places around. It's very cold in apartment in October, even heater doesn't help :(

Would stay here again in an instant! Lovely and sparkling clean apartment with excellent location close to everything you'l need in Porto. My boyfriend, who is a chef, and I stayed here and had everything we needed in the kitchen to cook a few great meals. Nice efficient setup of a completely renovated space in old building, with clean and lovely touches - feels like a fresh hotel room. I normally stay in quirky older places (which often have a few strange limitations that I can live with) but this place had a clean and new freshness that I really appreciated as a traveler, mixed into an older historical context. Also, Abel was always friendly and quick to respond, and let me leave my bags in the room before actual check in time, which helped me out greatly. The apartment looks exactly like the pictures - plus good internet and full cable tv. Definintely a good deal, recommended!
