Die Unterkunft an sich ist sehr sauber und 8 Gehminuten vom Strand entfernt. Wir haben Fahrräder und Autos gemietet. Auch der shuttle vom und zum Flughafen hat reibungslos geklappt. Ein paar Sachen haben uns (Pärchen) dann doch gestört.
Zum einen war das Zimmer sehr warm, deutlich wärmer als der Rest des Hauses. Trotz der 2 Standventilatoren und der einen an der Decke. 
Des Weiteren wurden wir drauf aufmerksam gemacht, die Türen leise zuzumachen. Leider haben die keine Rahmen keine Gummidichtung sodass man echt kontrolliert die Tür schließen muss.
Ansonsten sehr aufgeschlossenes, sympathisches Paar mit 2 Kindern. Geben gute Tips für Trips. 

Ps: Falls ihr viel am Strand liegen wollt wäre Kailua nicht die beste Option. Wir hatten oft regen.

We have had 2 amazing nights. Frank   and Melissa are 2 extremely warm People Who Will make their home Your home. My son played with their 2 Lovely kids. I can recommend this place to everybody. This was my first experience with airbnb. Will do this again

Airbnbを利用するのが初めてだったので少し不安でしたが､そんなことすぐに忘れてしまうくらいｶｲﾙｱでの滞在はとても素晴らしいものでした｡
かわいらしいｶｲﾙｱの街まで自転車で行って美味しいごはんを食べてお買いもの｡最高だったのは､素敵なﾋﾞｰﾁに家から歩いて行けることでした｡
家はきれいで過ごしやすく､夜はとても静かでぐっすり眠れました｡
MelissaとFrankはとても優しく親切で､英語があまり得意でない私に､｢大丈夫?楽しでる?｣と声をかけてくれました｡
もっと会話できるように英語を上達させて､また遊びに行きます｡

Melissa And Frank
Thank you for all your kindness.
 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Yuriko
Melissa et Franck sont des personnes très sympathiques et leur maison est bien située toute proche de la mer.  Par contre pour les déplacements  prévoir une voiture c'est plus simple !

Un vrai coin de paradis à 5minutes à pied d'une magnifique plage 
L'accueil est excellent et sympathique... Chambre très propre avec vue sur une piscine de 12m de longueur de quoi se dégourdir les jambes en fin de journée...Un accès simple au centre ville et à l'autoroute. Pas loin d'Honolulu et de l'aéroport...

Frank was great; he and Melissa even offered to share their dinner with us.  The little breakfast cakes are simply delicious.  We were in Kailua to visit family.  Staying here was very convenient.  We truly appreciate the friendly treatment we received.

Melissa and Cabral were welcoming, and Kailua Blue Ocean Breeze was a pleasant experience.  However, we were unable to take full advantage of the amenities as we spent the majority of our time out and about experiencing Kailua.

Very relaxing spot! A minute or 2 walk to a beautiful beach, and very quiet & chilled household to stay in - the perfect place to recharge the batteries!
Lovely hosts who made me feel welcome in their home but gave me space.
About 30mins walk to shops /food, suggest if possible rent a car to get here (uber was expensive!) & use to explore area.

Melissa and Frank's house is nice and walking distance to the beach. It's driving distance to the grocery store and "downtown" Kailua. They are nice people and had good suggestions on where to go and what to eat. They provided towels and shampoo/conditioner/etc. They provide a mini fridge and fan, but the room was about 10 degrees warmer than the outside temp since there is no air flow with the door closed.
For us, the house had quite an empty, tippy-toeing-around feeling. What I mean by this is you walk into the big dining room/kitchen through the side patio door and your room and a couple others and bathroom is to the left. It's quiet and personally, a little too quiet for my wife and I (there are small kids in the house who go to school, so there are signs about not slamming doors, which I get, but the house has tile floors, minimal furniture, and is big, so everything makes noise). The living room with the tv and couch, I'm assuming, is through the doors on the right...we never went that way as we came late and weren't shown that part of the house, so we chose to eat our dinner and watch our own shows in our room on our ipad. 
I'd recommend this place if you have small kids (it has a pool!) or just using it as a base to sleep which is why it worked for us since we had a lot of things planned and weren't there very often.
Kailua is a great location, amazing beaches close by and much more relaxed than Honolulu. Loved driving up the North Shore, and handy having Wholefoods and good food options a short drive away!

Melissa and Frank were awesome hosts! I arrived in on a later flight and Melissa was able to meet me and orient me to my room. They had great recommendations and were super friendly. I came over during Thanksgiving weekend and they were very hospitable! I enjoyed some Thanksgiving dinner with Melissa and Frank and their friends whom were also very friendly. 

The location is a 2 min walk from the beach. The location is fairly quiet and is an easy drive to other parts of the island. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to my friends!

This is a good place to stay if you want to be in a Kailua neighborhood with fairly close beach access.  The hosts were very nice, the place is quite spacious and clean. 
We had good communication and there were no issues checking in and getting access to our room. 
The guest room we were in was large and comfortable. 
Guests appear to stay on one side of the house, separated from the hosts living areas by a large open kitchen.  This is a family and they do have 1 (maybe 2) small children, which were not a problem, but you are staying with a family and they are there.   The house is on a main arterial and it was a bit more noisy than we expected, as there is a lot of traffic on it.  You park beside their driveway, which is off the side street.  (The house is on a corner).  This suited our purposes perfectly for what we needed to do for the one night in Kailua.  If you are planning on doing Waikiki things, this would probably not be your best option.
If you want great beach, the access to the amazing Kailua is very good.  Quiet beach, amazing sunrises.

Mellisa and Cabral have a lovely home that they love to share with people! The room was spacious and clean! The location was perfect! A 4 minute walk from the beach and a really close drive to downtown Kailua. I had a fantastic time at the beach and doing some great hikes that they recommended. There were treats in the kitchen, an awesome yard and a cozy room!
Great hosts, home, and location!  The beach (beautiful) is only a couple of blocks away.  When you arrive back to the house, a pool awaits!  Awesome!

Melissa and Frank were great hosts.  They respected our privacy and helped us with suggestions of what to see on our trip to the north of the island.  The house is very clean and well located near the beach.  Their pool is an added bonus.  Thanks a lot Melissa and Frank!!
Melissa and Frank embody the aloha spirit.    Our stay was calm and tranquil. You will have no regrets staying with them .  This was our second visit :)

Had a wonderful stay as Melissa and Frank really know how to run an Airbnb right- the organization was impressive (rental car, bikes, coordination with flights etc). They were also happy to provide recommendations and assistance from a "locals" standpoint. While we rented a room, and they were a family actually living in the house, I was surprised at how quiet the house was. Nice and peaceful for a relaxing vacation. Not to mention their two little ones were very cute and well behaved! I recommend.
Easy to communicate with, gave great recommendations, great having the pool as well.

Host Cabral and Melissa is very kind and helpful.
Room and bathroom is very clean.
They asked me to have some coffee every morning and did their best let my journey comfortable.
The most good thing is... they have beach items... umbrella and beach chair and etc. Hope that stay there again.
마인드가 좋은 호스트임.
깨끗하고, 맛집도 소개해줌.
렌탈, 픽업 드랍어프서비스도 좋았음.
세어 룸은 총 3개인 것 같음.
Kailua비치까지는 걸어서 20분 넘게 걸리지만, 10분 걸리는 다른 비치도 있음(난 차타고 다님). 와이키키와는 다른 조용한 분위기.

We were really thankful Melissa and Cabral were able to host us on very short notice. They made it very easy for us to come and go. Their place is a very short walk to the beach which was awesome and they provided beach towels for us which was great. We used their place as a home base to explore the south east part of the island so actually we hardly crossed paths. But when we did Melissa was super nice.
Lovely place, very close to the beach, excellent hosts.
Exactly what I was looking for! Very clean and cozy.  Extremely close to one of the best beaches on the island.

They were very gracious hosts.  I would recommend saying with them to others.  We had our own bathroom which I was unsure of when we booked.  Melissa and Frank were willing to give information when asked.  They have a beautiful yard with a lap pool, lounge chairs and BBQ.  It was only 2 blocks down to the beach trail and beautiful beach.

Check in was easy
The location is convenient
Melissa was a treasure of tips for great things to do
Loved the place

Melissa and Frank are gracious hosts and made me feel very welcome. The accommodations had everything I needed and they even provided beach and snorkeling gear, if needed. I loved the lap pool, too. Only a couple of blocks from the gorgeous beach. They also provided good tips on things to see and do.

If you want to be in Hawai'i and really feel like you are there, I would recommend Melissa and Frank's place. 

It's nice to have somebody greet you with an 'Aloha' and ask how your day was at the end of the day. I was in Hawaii by myself for a conference and wanted some peace and quiet and wanted to enjoy the island. 

Had a great couple of surfing lessons with Frank and Melissa nicely offered tea for me in the evenings. 

They have the cutest children and it was actually nice to hear the sound of happy young children in the house. 

They provide enough towels and I liked they had a large closet and a small fridge. 

I would stay with them again when I visit Oahu.

Wonderful family located in one of the best places! We had a great time at Melissa and Frank's! The beach near their house was our absolute favorite--quiet and scenic. A short bike ride to town was perfect for dinner and ice cream. Definitely a good place to stay in Kailua!
Perfect place. Clean, friendly, convenient, perfect location.

The room met our needs in most regards. The hosts were away when we arrived and throughout our stay. Our room opened into the hosts living space and, not knowing they would not be home we kept our door closed the first night. However there was only one window and no cross ventilation or A.C. and it was  very hot.
Awesome place. Super nice hosts. Great kids. Nice pool and close to the beach. Clean and spacious place
Definitely worth it! Great location!
Clean bathroom like a spa, comfortable bed, very nice family host.
Beautiful property in Kailua about a 15 minute bike ride from Kailua Beach Park. About 20-25 minute bike ride to Lanikai.
lovely place, clean room, 3 blocks walk from the beach. Melissa and Frank was really wonderful. Thanks!

Melissa and Cabral have a wonderful house and garden with a pool. We stayed in the private room, we were in the same space as the family. However we were close to them and to their 2 beautiful kids, we have not heard any of them preparing for the day in the mornings, they were absolultely not noisy. Everything was peaceful and calm during our stay.The bathroom is like a spa, clean and well equipped with soap,shampoo, conditioner for their guests. Kailua beach is like 10minutes away by walk. We enjoyed a lot our stay at Melissa and Cabral.
Loved the location as it was a walking distance to the beach. Very accommodating and communicative with a comfortable environment. I highly recommend another visit next time I'm at Oahu.
Close to the beach, clean room and bathroom.
Great location,beaches and eating. Frank and Melissa provided great information as well as snorkling gear and towels. We would highly recommend staying here. Peter and Julie

The simple laid-back aura of Kahlúa .........
And over the top hosts. Melissa and Frank go out of their way to make sure that you are well handled and taken care of.
 One of my best trips ever, and now I have new friends ..

No furniture and the website is misleading.  There is no private bath the hall bath is shared.

It is convenient to the beach and a nice walk into town.
I will NEVER ask to rent again.  I rented for 4 days and checked out on second day...did not want my friends to visit.

Location! Location! Location! This is the perfect place with the perfect hosts.
Bonus, the room has air conditioner!

Can't find a better deal!

Melissa and Frank always had great suggestions for things to do, places to go, and places to eat. We rented a car through them and it was an easy, but professional process. They made us feel like we were there ohana, we never felt like we were outsiders in their home. Beautiful home in a great location! We will definitely be back and use them again!
We had a great stay in Kailua. Melissa gave us many great recommendations for food and loaned us beach stuff.  We were greatful for the little AC unit in the bedroom since it gets warm!
Melissa and Frank were awsome!the place is super very clean beautiful home and the bathroom was amazing I would def go back and stay there again!thanks guys!!

Our stay was perfect.The house is lovely, bright and clean.The swimming pool is a delight and the beautiful beaches are a very short walk from the house.We used the  buses and with a bit of walking managed to get around the island very cheaply. Melissa and Frank have a great house on a beautiful side of
 Oahu.We really enjoyed our stay and Melissa and Frank helped me when I asked for anything.I highly recommend a stay.

Melissa and Frank's place is a treasure. A beautiful, quiet home with an in-ground pool, only a block and a half walk to a gorgeous, uncrowded beach (with a large shade tree if you need it)  and 1.5m bike ride to Kailua Town, which is full of restaurants, shops, and a Whole Foods. Melissa and Frank have bicycles, towels, beach chairs, and umbrellas for you to borrow and make you feel right at home. I had my own private bath and a/c in my room. I feel so lucky to have found this gem and stayed here after my conference in Honolulu. I hope to come back again!

The house is very beatiful. It was near to the sea. And whit a cat you are very shortly in lanikai or honolulu.
It was very nice and the pool was cool :)
Melissa and Frank are fantastic hosts. They have a beautiful home and a welcoming attitude toward it! I would recommend this listing without hesitation.
Everything was perfect, I had a great time at Melissa And Frank's place! I recommend this listing and would definitely come again!

We were able to relax at Melissa and Frank's house during the stay. 

The bedroom is clean and tidy.

There is a work desk in the bedroom. I could work with my laptop. It was convenient.

The bed was comfortable for sleeping with 2 adults and a kid.

There are enough amenities for us. 

We didn't worry about a meal. There is a supermarket open until midnight. It's not far from the house.
The host canceled this reservation 142 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Melissa and Frank are gracious hosts who embrace the Aloha spirit. I researched Airbnb for a spot close to Hawaii Pacific University, in Kaneohe, so I could help my freshmen son do errands and move in with ease. 

We were greeted with kindness and moved into their home for a week. Our room was spotless and had a small refridgerator. The bathroom, also very clean, was 2 steps away from the bedroom. We had access to their pool and were invited to a BBQ. They have 2 adorable and very polite children, who added joy to our stay. The way the space is layed out evenings is our guest room were quiet and relaxing.

Both Melissa and Frank are professionals. They graciously offered us knowledge of potential doctors, restaurants, stores, etc. They offered to be available to my son, after I left. 
 
I hope to stay with them when I return to Ohau. If you are lucky enough to stay with them, please tell them "Hello" from me. They couldn't have been a better match for us. XO

Across the street from beautiful Kailua Beach!
Frank, Melissa, and their beautiful 2 children were just great!!! Everything you want is here!!

Mahalo for sharing your home with me!
❤️
Good location!

I spent 4 nights at Melissa and Frank's and everything has been great! They are great hosts, very respectful and would make everything for you to have the most amazing experience in Hawaii. If you have time during your stay don't hesitate to take private surf classes, you won't regret it! Frank is a great teacher and you'll be sure to catch some cool Hawaiian waves! 

The place/room was as nice as expected, and the pool is definitely a plus. I would recommend to have a car there though, but if you don't (like me) you'll be able to use a bicycle of theirs to ride around Kailua and go to the various spots. Everything is super easy to go to by bike :)

Mahalo Melissa and Frank!

The house is in a great neighborhood about a 5 minute walk to the beach. It's a nice quiet neighborhood beach. The town is about a 5 minute drive with all the shopping and restaurants one could want. We loved staying in Kailua and would definitely stay again. There's a mini fridge in the room too which was great. Comfy bed and a white noise machine, plus a/c. Terrific all around.

Can't say enough good things about our stay with Melissa and Frank. The room we rented in their home was spacious, clean, and comfortable. The window air conditioner made it very comfortable to sleep at night. The washroom was clean and well appointed.

We really appreciated having use of the beach chairs and umbrella, especially with a beautiful beach just a short walk across the road. It was very convenient to take a 5 minute walk to a spectacular beach.

Melissa and Frank were very knowledgeable and gave great suggestions for food and activities around the island. Their children were also very respectable and it was a pleasure to stay in their home.

The location is perfect, it is just a quick walk to the beach and Kailua has some cute shops and restaurants. The room itself is spacious and has got an A.C. and a fridge. To reach the bathroom you have to cross the hallway, which opens up to the kitchen. That wasn't ideal, but fine for us.

사진과 같습니다. 
카일루아 해변과 정말 가까워서, 도보로 3분 정도면 도착할 수 있습니다. 
가격도 합리적인 금액으로 포드차량 렌트했구요, 깨끗하고 새차였습니다. 
그리고 Frank는 정말 친절한 호스트라서, 식당도 추천해주고, 마트도 알려줘서 고마웠어요. 
그리고 문제가 있으면 바로바로 수정해주셔서 감사했어요. 
그리고 정점은 서핑!!! ㅎㅎ
서핑 수업이 쫌 비싼감은 있지만, 그만큼의 즐거움을 느낄 수 있을껍니다!!
다만, 바닥에 먼지와 모래가 있어서, 실내화를 챙겨가시길 권해드려요. 
그리고 가정집이라서 빨래를 할 수 있을 줄 알았지만 아니였어요;; 그래도 햇볕이 좋으니 힘들겠지만, 손빨래도 나쁘진 않아요. 
가격대비 만족합니다!!

Schöne, saubere Unterkunft mit sehr netten Gastgebern. Lage zu einem nicht überlaufenen langen schönen Strand ist grossartig. 
Großes bequemes Bett, eigenes Bad mit Badewanne, Aircondition + eigener Kühlschrank im Zimmer.
Nice, clean and reasonably quiet room very close to the beach! I was stoked on having my own bathroom. Would recommend to anyone visiting Kailua.

Me and my gf came and stayed with Melissa and Frank for one night in Kailua.  The house was located very close to both Kailua State Beach Park as well as Lanikai Beach.  

Melissa and Frank were amazing, and we loved staying at their beautiful home.  It was very open and at no time did we feel uncomfortable.  We had ample privacy and Frank and Melissa were always close by in case we needed any recommendations or just a chit chat.  

Frank is also a surf instructor and very knowledgeable about the island (we did not have time to sign up for lessons this trip).  I think the best thing about the space was the attention to detail.  We absolutely loved the bathroom and decorations.  It was very elegant.  Would not hesitate to stay with them again!

とても素晴らしいﾎｽﾄでした｡
場所も静かで安全な場所でﾋﾞｰﾁへも近いです｡
ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝなども車で7分ほどで町の中心地へ移動できるので困ることはないです｡

ﾌﾟｰﾙ付きのｱﾒﾘｶっぽい家でｱﾒﾆﾃｨも充実しとても清潔でした｡

ﾎｽﾄも日本人だと分かるとゆっくり話してくれるので日本人の方も安心です!
Great location and great hosts!
Great location to the beach, just a 3 minute walk. Beautiful home. Clean & spacious room and bathroom.

Melissa and Cabral are wonderful hosts, and their home is in a wonderful location--just a short walk from the beach and in a very quiet area of Hawaii.

They were full of great tips around the area, very generous with their beach towels/chairs/snorkels/umbrellas, and made our first trip to Hawaii a breeze. 

Highly recommend if you're looking for an experience in Oahu away from Waikiki/the bustle of downtown, but still accessible to the majority of the sites you'll want to see.
We had a great time at Melissa and Frank’s place. Really the nicest couple. The room was sparkling clean and had everything we needed and more. Would definitely stay here again!
Alles wie beschrieben, sehr schöner Strand

Good house!

거실 겸 주방을 주인과 공유하고, 방과 화장실은 개별적으로 쓸 수 있어요. 

방과 화장실은 깨끗하게 잘 정리 되어 있었어요. 
부기보드, 비치체어, 파라솔 등을 빌릴 수 있어서 좋았습니다. 주인분이 서핑 강사도 하셔서 서핑 레슨도 받았어요. 1인 110달러였구요, 1시간30분~2시간 정도 해주시는데 잘 가르쳐 주세요. 카일루아 해변에서 서핑 수업 했는데 사람도 많이 없고 경치도 좋아서 한적하게 배우고 즐길 수 있었어요. 카일루아 홀푸드마켓과도 차로 5분정도면 갈 수 있어서 홀푸드마켓 주차장에 주차하고 그 주변 맛집들 다닐 수 있어서 편리했습니다.  호스트에게 궁금한 게 있어서 물어보면 친절하게 잘 알려주세요.

다만, 침대는 저희가 체구가 작은데도 둘이 자기에 좁은 느낌이 있었어요. 거실 바닥에 모래가 조금 있는데 신발을 벗고 다녀야 해서 저희는 기내용 슬리퍼를 사용했어요.

주인내외분과 거실 겸 주방을 공유하기 때문에 마주칠 일이 잦은데, 호스트와 자주 마주치는 것을 꺼려 하시지 않는다면 추천합니다.
great location, friendly hosts, highly recommended

Recommend! Beautiful home with great amenities! The pool is huge and the guest rooms are clean and spacious. Very convenient location with parking on premises and close to beaches. Melissa and Frank are amazing hosts! :)
Staying in Kailua at the home of Melissa and Frank was delightful. They will be among our favourite memories of lovely Hawaii. Peace shalom paix  Margaret & Terry

Great place to stay! Melissa and Frank's place is exactly as pictured - a clean, private room and bathroom in their home. The house is in a perfect location to go to the beach in Kailua or Lanikai. We also rented a car from them for convenience, which included a round trip airport ride. They were very communicative and gave us great local recommendations.
전반적으로 조용하고 좋았습니다. 주방을 공유해야하다보니 요리를 해먹기가 어려웠던 점 말고는 편안하고 친절한 호스트였어요^^
aucun commentaire sur le logement tout était bien.

This place was fantastic!! Super clean and beautiful home right next to some of the prettiest beaches. The hosts were very nice and offered us many tips. Also a huge plus as we rented a car from them which made our entire experience and we could explore the whole island. Would definitely stay again!
The house was in the perfect location for a quick walk to the public beach access. Room was great, with air conditioning. Definitely would stay here again if we get back to Hawaii!

Melissa and Frank are amazing hosts. They are super kind and helpful. Their place is beautiful and warm and the guest rooms are perfectly clean and spacious (it has got an A.C. and a mini-fridge). The location is great: just a short walk from the beach (less than five minutes) and the neighborhood is really quiet. Extra point: If you have time during your stay take private surf classes with Frank! He is an amazing teacher and the whole experience was superb. Mahalo for sharing your home with me.
Very accommodating and responsive. Helpful with local tips. The beach closeby is amazing!
Melissa and Frank were very accommodating, communicative and live in a beautiful home in a great location.

Perfect hosts! Lovely family. My daughter didn’t want to leave this place and I had to explain why. It wasn’t easy. Beach is close and nice. Pool is good. Kitchen with all you need. Delicious breakfast if you want. All nice, clean with style. At the first evening, I was rescued with delicious dinner with local beer. If we will be in O‘ahu again, we will stay there, for sure.
They made my first trip to Hawaii very special and a plus was them having a rental car! Would definitely stay here again!

Kailua is an incredible place to be : ) The beach is a stone’s throw away and the town is easy stroll too. Better yet, Melissa and Frank have a cruiser bike that permits even easier access to the area.  The house and hospitality were also first-rate in my book. I’d definitely recommend it!
Nice people and a great place to stay at.

Great place! Melissa and Frank made us feel right at home. They were great with recommendations and accommodating to the guests needs. They room had everything needed to enjoy your time on the island. The backyard was an oasis as well! I would highly recommend staying with them!
Melissa was lovely and greeted me as I came in. Quiet area and literally steps from the beach.

Location is great to stay on the east side. Home is quiet & perfect for a place to sleep. If renting a car make sure you arrange drive times to and from the airport in advance, so that they can figure out their personal schedule in order to accommodate you.
Very clean, very goid quality bed/matress, friendly hosts and walking distance to the beach!

Melissa & Frank offer their home and their kindness! From check in and offering to carry our bags to showing us where everything was.. it was truly like visiting family. They are super committed to living a healthy happy Hawaiian lifestyle and we look forward to surfing next time!

Melissa and Frank's place was just what I needed, a simple, comfortable & clean place to sleep while I spent the days and evenings in Aloha bliss.  Melissa gave me some great tips on things to do.  She let me use her beach cruiser all week &  I had an amazing surf lesson with Frank. They even invited me to join in their pool side BBQ with their friends and family. 
The beach was just a few minutes walk from their house and Kailua Town, Farmer's  Market and Whole Foods were just a mile or so from their home.
 Renting their car was super simple and a great and affordable way to get around and see the island.  
 It was warm in Hawaii so I appreciated the air conditioner in my room. 
I am back in Seattle and still feeling Aloha.
Mahalo to Melissa and Frank
I’m always happy to go to Kay’s place. I always feel home and welcome. I like the coffee in the morning and the beautiful pool. An incredible beach is just at 5mn walk

We had a wonderful stay, would stay again, and recommend to others. The home is walking distance to beaches (Kalama and Kailua), restaurants, and grocery store. Heads up, the home is along a main road, but overall is a great location.
The house and the room were very clean, tidy and elegant. The area was nice too and Kay suggested us a nice restaurant closeby.

Amazing stay at Mike and Melissa’s! They provided everything we needed and more. Very clean space with great A/C and awesome pool in the yard. They let us use their two beach bikes and we were able to bike all around Kailua. Steps away from a beautiful quiet beach and close to all amenities including a grocery store, restaurants, and a farmers market. 10/10 recommend!
This place was great and Kay is a great host the only thing I wish there was a tv in are room !!!!!! Great quiet place to stay and super close to the beach !!!!!
A great location within walking distance to the beach and close by good restaurants.
海の近くで場所がとてもよかったです!とても静かでのんびり滞在できました｡ｼｭﾉｰｹﾙｾｯﾄやﾋﾞｰﾁﾀｵﾙも借りれて､海を思う存分ｴﾝｼﾞｮｲできました｡ありがとうございました｡

Kay was great at communicating before, during and after my stay.  Very friendly hosts, clean and comfortable bed, great location, I would recommend staying here again for friends and/or family.  Frank was also sweet and I love that they offer surf lessons as well, even though I wasn't able to take advantage of that offering this time.  I love the close location to Kailua beach...definitely recommend the walk along the beach in the morning.   Thanks for a great stay!

Kay and Frank are lovely hosts and their home is just a few minutes walk to the beach! My stay was comfortable and relaxing and I highly recommend their home for exploring Kailua. I was grateful for their tips on local favorites and their warm hospitality. Feeling much aloha after my stay!
Beautiful family, great communication. Very accommodating, great location so close to the beach.
Lovely home, great location. don't forget to take your surf lesson, they have the best surf instructor in Kailua.
Kay and Frank are extremely nice and welcoming. They gave us a detailed instruction on where to park which was helpful. Highly recommended.

Our stay in Kailua was absolutely lovely. Our intention was to have a quiet laid back getaway in little Kailua and that is what we got. Kay’s place is private and is a short bike/walk from their beautiful beach. We didn’t even rent a car for our stay and walked around and discovered some awesome local treasures like their Saturday farmer’s market, Manoa Chocolate, and a quaint bookstore as well as other shops and lots of great food. 
The Hosts were so helpful and wanted to make sure our vacation was the best it could be by being available to answer questions and recommendations but also let us go about our stay with minimal contact otherwise. They let us borrow their beach bikes to ease our walking which ended up being PERFECT for adventuring. We will 100% be back if we return to Kailua for another trip
Although we stayed only 2 nights we enjoyed. good location, nice family.

We loved our stay at Frank and Melissa's. The bedroom was clean and cozy, and the perfect place to stay while we explored Kailua. It was nice to have our own bathroom and Melissa made sure we had everything we needed during our stay.

I cannot recommend AirBnB enough! Not only were Frank and Melissa accommodating, they were also beyond generous and kind. Frank had great tips for local places to explore such as where to go hiking or which beaches were the best to visit. I even took a surf lesson with Frank, which I highly recommend! I had an incredible time and it was really thanks to the wonderful hosts.
Considerate, accommodating, clean, and kind. As easy a stroll to the beach as possible on Kalaheo, considering the private home access dominating the entry points.

Warmly greeted with a large room waiting for us after a long travel in. We were able to have our own bathroom during our stay; clean towels, roomy and shampoo/body wash provided. Mattress is great if you like a very firm bed. Small refrigerator is provided in the room. The best part of this place is the walking distance to the beautiful beach! They also gave us plenty of ideas of things to do, sites to see and food to eat! That made our trip extra special. Thanks again!
Nice Clean Quiet Relaxing place to stay. Only few minutes walk to the beach.

The Kailua Blue Ocean Breeze is a wonderful place to stay. You get a private room and bath in a family home. A lovely lap pool and garden space is just outside your window and the house is steps from the beach. Downtown Kailua is a 5-minute drive. The house is very clean and the owners are very nice. There was a problem with the shower the first day that Frank made sure to fix right away. I would definitely stay there again.
Nice accommodations but on a heavily trafficked road. They are a family with children.

ｶｲﾙｱﾋﾞｰﾁまで歩いてすぐで､車でｶｲﾙｱﾀｳﾝも5分くらいと完璧すぎる立地でした｡1日に何度もｶｲﾙｱﾀｳﾝに行けて幸せなｶｲﾙｱ ｽﾃｲでした｡
ﾋﾞｰﾁにはﾁｪｱｰなども借りられ快適な過ごし方ができました｡
Frankはとても感じのいいﾎｽﾄで英語が苦手な私たちにも親切でありがたかったです｡また次もｶｲﾙｱｽﾃｲにして利用したいです｡

It was such a blessing to be able to find such an affordable ArB&B so close to our daughter and her family. The location was also perfect because I had recently injured my left leg and was still able to make the very short walk to the beach. Although our room was within their house, we always felt safe and secure with the locked gate leading to the side of the house. Frank has two children but they rarely were even seen and were always respectful using great manners to greet us just like their parents. Frank regularly greeted us each morning and often inquired about our day's activities when we returned each night. When a family opens up their beautiful home to share Paradise with others, that tells me they are very special people. We highly recommend Frank"s place!

Frank and his wife was very nice. The house is perfect ( beautiful, clean and spacious)  and it has a great location ( near lanikai beach) . We had a private room with air conditioner. 
We recommend it. Thank you very much Frank!

name: Hotel CoNext - Family Room ( 3人家庭房)
summary: 位于市中心步行2分钟便到港铁站,有4条公交线路來往机场,十分方便｡步行十分钟便可達尖沙咀,距離红磡体育馆步行十分钟便可達,看演唱會真的超方便喔! 楼宇內安裝有進口大品牌电梯,可直達楼層,24小時保安巡視,让您住的安全放心,小区周边设施齐全,品牌商店有万宁､屈臣氏､莎莎化庒品,卓悅化庒品,周大福金舖等等,也有老牌药店余仁生,位元堂,同仁堂等等,購買生活百貨方便快捷,邻近歺庁美色种类繁多有澳洲牛奶,翠华歺庁,大排檔,知名粥店,甜品店等等. 华時尚裝修,配备舒适的大床和床垫,相信您一定会舒舒服服的睡个好觉!除此之外卧室还有空調,挂墙液晶电视,免费百兆wifi,每個房间內都有独立卫生间,(24小時熱水是妥妥的)!

reviews.comments: 不建议入住,订了之后很后悔,房价可以住好一点的酒店了!房间清洁卫生差!

name: Quiet and bright room with balcony
summary: Amplia y cómoda habitación de 20 metros con una cama doble y cómodo balcón para fumadores. - La puerta del dormitorio tiene cerradura ,WI-FI, TV,  ropa de cama y toallas.
space: Hola, me  gustaría ofrecerle la mejor ubicación y el alojamiento. Bienvenidos a Barcelona! Si vas a venir a descansar y desconectar de la casa, para conectar con la ciudad de Barcelona, o para trabajar, nos encantaría ofrecerle todas las comodidades para hacer su estancia lo más cómoda e inolvidable como sea posible. Nuestras ofertas de casas: Apartamento céntrico y bien situado con ascensor. Edificio modernista construido a finales del siglo 19 con valor histórico nominal. Amplia y cómoda habitación de 20 metros. Una cama  150x190cm con un colchón nuevo viscoelástico.  2 Baños compartido  Terraza con una mesa para dos para disfrutar de una copa de vino fuera. - La puerta del dormitorio tiene una cerradura. -TV de 40 pulgadas. Situado en el centro de Barcelona, pero a pesar de esto se duerme muy a gusto y tranquilo, ya que la habitación sale a patio de atrás de edificio.  -Cerca de tiendas, estación de metro, restaurantes y supermercados. Usted tiene todo lo necesario para sus vacacion
description: Amplia y cómoda habitación de 20 metros con una cama doble y cómodo balcón para fumadores. - La puerta del dormitorio tiene cerradura ,WI-FI, TV,  ropa de cama y toallas. access: Sábanas (incluído en el precio) Toallas de baño (incluído en el precio) Opcionales / servicios adicionales: Servicio de lavandería 10€ Aire acondicionado 10€/día
interaction: Hemos organizado el espacio de modo que usted puede tener tanta privacidad como desee. Su zona sólo se puede acceder mediante una llave que  se le dará a su llegada.
house_rules: Por favor, lea las siguientes reglas antes de proceder con la reserva: Check-in 15:00 Checa-out 10:00 - Está prohibido fumar dentro del apartamento. El incumplimiento de esta norma dará lugar a una sanción económica de 50 €. - Nos tomamos muy en serio la convivencia con los vecinos, por lo que está prohibido hacer cualquier ruido que pueda perturbar ellos, sobre todo a partir de las 21:00. - Hacer fiestas ( emborracharse) dentro del apartamento está estrictamente prohibido. - No está permitido invitar a dormir personas no incluidas en la reserva. - Al final de la estancia, el inquilino se compromete a dejar los utensilios de cocina limpios (platos, vasos, sartenes, cubiertos). - En el caso en el check-in después de las 20:00, tiene un suplemento de 15€ y debe notificarme con tiempo ( mínimo 24 horas). En caso de que no me notifique acerca de su llegada tarde, voy a tomar el derecho de alojarle al día siguiente. Amigos, vamos a respetar el uno al otro y nuestro tiempo) - Posible servici

host.host_location: Sierra Norte, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain

name: 2Units2Bedrooms2Bathrooms2ParkingOffPremises
summary: If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.  日本語でお気軽にお問い合わせください｡  如果您有任何问题,请随时联系我｡  Si tiene alguna pregunta no dude en contactarme.
space: On foot 10 min to beach, 5 min Waikiki downtown. 2 units together in one building. The condo is located at 417 Namahana Street, next to Holiday Inn Express Waikiki. Each unit has: 1 Free parking space off premises in Hale Koa Hotel Parking/Fort DeRussy Parking,  5 min walk from the condo. Free Wi-Fi . Cable TV. House telephone with nation-wide free calls. Unit 1 Apt #12:  2nd floor. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Fully equipped kitchen. 1 full size bed in bedroom. 2 twin size folding beds in living room.  1 free parking off premises, 5 min walk. Unit 2 Apt #15: 3rd floor. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Fully equipped kitchen. 1 Queen size bed in bedroom. 1 queen size sleeper in living room. 1 twin size sleeper in living room.  1 free parking off premises, 5 min walk.

On foot 10 min to beach, 5 min Waikiki downtown. 2 units together in one building. The condo is located at 417 Namahana Street, next to Holiday Inn Express Waikiki. Each unit has: 1 Free parking space off premises in Hale Koa Hotel Parking/Fort DeRussy Parking,  5 min walk from the condo. Free Wi-Fi . Cable TV. House telephone with nation-wide free calls. Unit 1 Apt #12:  2nd floor. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Fully equipped kitchen. 1 full size bed in bedroom. 2 twin size folding beds in living room.  1 free parking off premises, 5 min walk. Unit 2 Apt #15: 3rd floor. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Fully equipped kitchen. 1 Queen size bed in bedroom. 1 queen size sleeper in living room. 1 twin size sleeper in living room.  1 free parking off premises, 5 min walk. - Building was built in 1953. - Walk-up building. - There is NO elevator. - Apt 12 i
notes: - Building was built in 1953. - Walk-up building. - There is NO elevator. - Apt 12 is on the 2nd floor (ground floor being 1st) using the staircase 2. - Apt 15 is on the 3rd floor (ground floor being 1st) using the staircase 2. - There is NO nice view. - There is NO swimming pool. - There is a considerable amount of noise from street especially early morning when garbage trucks and tour buses come. - Free parking is off premises, NOT on the premises.

name: Family Hawaiian Paradise on Marina Top Level
summary: Get away from the hustle of Waikiki. Relax at this beautiful Hawaiian home on the marina. This home is set along Oahu’s beautiful Hawaii Kai Marina, in a safe and quiet neighborhood. ADDITIONAL FEATURES & AMENITIES -Hammock -Jetted Bath Tub -Kayaks & Stand up Paddle board -BBQ Grill -24/7 Local resident insight Points of Interest: -10 minutes drive to Hanauma Bay -20 minutes drive to Diamond Head Beach Access: -On property marina access leading to the ocean -15 minutes drive to Waikiki Beach
space: Create gourmet feasts in our fully-equipped kitchen. Nod off to the soothing sounds of the ocean every night in any of the three air-conditioned bedrooms. The Master suite features entry onto the beautiful terrace overlooking the marina and an attached bathroom. Our second Master suite features mountain views and an attached bathroom. Our guest bedroom has a queen bed with a detached bathroom. There are two living rooms, each with large flat screen TVs and comfortable sofas that convert into full-size beds. There is an additional lounger that converts into a single bed in the second master bedroom.

neighborhood_overview: Very peaceful and safe neighborhood. Parties are a big no no. Trade winds blow nicely throughout the house. Mostly sunny days bless this home :)
notes: There may be guests occupying the downstairs unit. Common areas to share will be the marina access. Also, the life vests, BBQ grill shared from 11am-7pm and water sports gear. Call me if there are any concerns. The cleaners may use the washer and dryer once or not at all during your stay. We will keep communication lines open if and when this may occur during your stay. The laundry room is downstairs and separate from the upstairs unit.  Other things to note To comply with City & County of Honolulu requirements: (1) We issue one waiver liability agreement per guest. THIS LISTING HAS A ZERO TOLERANCE FOR PARTIES AND EXCESSIVE NOISE. We reserve the right to cancel your stay with no refund during your stay. Police may be involved. ***This listing has a STRICT check in and check out policy. 10AM Checkout is strictly enforced and guests will be BILLED for the RATE OF HALF A DAY if they check out ANY LATER than 10AM without prior approval from the listing host. In the event that a guests get
transit: Public transportation is right down the street. (Website hidden by Airbnb) can help you plan your transportation times. I would personally recommend a rental car and take a drive down the south coast. Such epic views.
access: Garage, driveway, laundry room, upstairs unit, and downstairs patio.
interaction: Call or text me anytime for questions on the property or for local expertise of things to do.
house_rules: You must turn off the AC prior to leaving our home please. We are a very sustainable island and we "Malama da Aina" by conserving of our energy consumption.  Please close all windows prior to leaving, as the trade winds may damage the blinds and rain may damage the interior of our home.  You must separate recycling from the trash. We will have signage to help keep it easy. Smoking in designated outside area only

host.host_about:
Aloha,

I am Paul Kealoha Naeole Fritz Jr. I am Hawaiian mix or hapa as we say here locally. I was born and educated on the east coast of the United States. I now reside in my family's native home of Hawai'i. My wish is to share the spirit of Aloha with you and your family. Aloha is a way of life that touches & refills your soul. Like a fresh drink in a scorching desert...Aloha is what you need! 

Much love and a big Mahalo,
Paul Kealoha Naeole Fritz Jr

reviews.comments: We absolutely loved this house. Wish we could’ve stayed longer☺️. Paul was spectacular! His communication was superb. We were pleased that the home looked just like the pictures. I got a chance to meet him and was greeted with that warm “aloha” greeting and friendliness that was prevalent throughout the island. The view from the lanai was amazing. The house is very roomy and accommodating. It would be a pleasure to stay here again.

This place was amazing. They even provided some shampoo and conditioner along with a lot of shower towels. The kitchen had everything we needed. The backyard was gorgeous, had paddle boards and kayaks for us to use. The rooms were huge. Everyone loved the place. It was perfect
Paul’s home was amazing the view was unbelievable and the house was very beautiful and clean would definitely recommend to anyone.
Perfect space for the family. Responsive host and great value for the space!

name: Recently renovated one bed apt in Happy Valley
summary: This recently renovated lovely one-bed apartment in Happy Valley (with small terrace) is fully furnished (including kitchen appliances, cutlery and crockery) and available for short-term let between 15 January - 14 February 2019. Excellent location. Close to big supermarket, public transport, shops, restaurants and bars and hospital. Includes small terrace and it's own private entrance (not through main block). Inclusive of all utilities, bills and weekly cleaner. A great introduction to HK.
space: This open plan 1 bedroom apartment has lovely high ceilings giving a sense of space and a glass partition between bedroom and living / dining room making it open and cosy.   A dining table to accomodate 4 for dinner comfortably and fully equipped kitchen.  Bathroom includes heated towel rail and bath / shower.

neighborhood_overview: Happy Valley is a great suburb in Hong Kong most residential.  It is a great community of both expat and local cantonese with many fabulous restaurant, bars and facilities e.g. supermarkets, hospital and the Happy Valley race course for horse racing enthusiasts Public transportation is excellent with the tram, buses and minibuses serving Central, Causeway Bay and other areas of Hong Kong
notes: NA
transit: Whilst street parking is challenging in the vicinity of the apartment, the public transporation options are excellent.  The 30 minibus goes from just outside the apartment and is only a 5-10 minutes short bus ride to Causeway Bay (MTR).  The #1 bus serves central in 20-30 minutes.  Taxi's are easily accessible from the street outside the apartment.   The close MTR station is Causeway Bay.
access: All spaces
interaction: However, I will be easily contactable by email or phone for any issues

离地铁站很近,小区门口就是的士站,交通很便利｡小区保安很严格,被问了好几次,安全系数挺高哒｡房主挺热情的,回复非常及时｡还是很开心的经历~
因为方便去香港,所以选择了住在福田口岸附近,房间真的是和图片一点都没差,装修风格炒鸡棒的,房东小雨非常用心,房间内有熏香还有鲜花,真的是非常nice啦,楼下就有生活超市,去口岸和地铁站步行就几分钟,可以说非常方便的啦,总的来说这次住房体验非常好,感谢房东小雨给我们打造了一个温馨的家,超赞!
Great location for visiting Futian check point. Beautiful bedroom with Hong Kong mountain view.
非常好

這次預約房間和男友度過平安夜,算是不錯的體驗｡整體感覺很滿意,房子空間夠大,感覺整潔和光猛｡很喜歡簡約風,給人舒適的感覺｡房東也很熱心回覆和幫忙,唯獨要提早離開通知得有一點遲,預約房間時沒有提及,因平安夜玩得比較晚,翌日早上要提早起比較匆忙｡房東說公共區域可以繼續使用,但清潔阿姨感覺我們很阻礙的樣子...
有些美中不足值得一提,床鋪感覺很惹塵,不知是白色的緣故還是甚麼,但鋪塵的感覺扣了一點分｡另外,很應聲,一大清早便被樓下的聲音吵醒｡除了這些,整體感覺還是滿意的｡

name: Квартира на улице в центре города.
summary: Квартира находится в центре города. Трамвайная остановка очень близка. 5 минут до Гранд-базара и Голубой мечети на трамвае, 30 минут до аэропорта на метро, 15 минут до улицы Таксим на такси или автобусе. Гостям предоставляется отдельная комната. Номер подходит для 4 человек. В номере есть два диван-кровати, телевизор, письменный стол и кондиционер. Гости также могут быть поражены кухней и ванной комнатой. Регистрация заезда в будние дни производится только после 19:00.
space: Daire şehir merkezinde yer almaktadır. Tramvay durağı çok yakındır. Kapalıçarşı ve Sultanahmet Camii'ne tramvayla 5 dakika, havaalanına metroyla 30 dakika, taksiyle ya da otobüsle Taksim Meydanı'na 15 dakika mesafededir. Konuklara özel bir oda verilecektir. Oda 4 kişi için uygundur. Odada iki çekyat, TV, çalışma masası ve klima bulunmaktadır. Konuklar ayrıca mutfak ve banyodan da yararlanabilir.

perfect location, very friendly people, good space
Great location in the center of Fatih! Tram station near the house. 800meters from the metro station Aksaray (to the Ataturk Airport). Uğur is sociable and responsible person. Recommend.

The location is very good. Uğur was polite and delicate to never disturb us that made us feel comfortable at the room. There were no enough linens and the couches are actually small so two people won’t feel comfortable on one. Nevertheless we had an opportunity to enjoy our evening with a cup of tea and the Netflix which was pleasant enough.

host.host_about: Hello this is Ceren, I am freelance stylist based in Istanbul. I love art and in my spare times I like to draw or paint pictures. I live in istanbul with my sister Irem.

reviews.comments:
Ceren was a great host! I was nicely welcomed and always had my private space. The apartment was clean. I was provided with a shoe shelf and two shelves in the fridge. 
 Ceren's responses were very quick. The apartment is 7 min by foot from a tram station that leads to the central part of Istanbul. My stay was very pleasant.

It is a lovely room like in your own apartment, makes you stay with comfort and safety. The place in local area and there will be market on each Tuesday which you can buy cheap and tasty fruits. There are a lot of restaurants, coffee, supermarkets and so on on the way from Çapa metro station to the apartment. For sure I will back and stay in the room again. Ceren is a kind and warm heart host, you will like her.

Restaurant, supermarkets, barbers, bank... it is a local residents area, if you want to live like local, then it will be a good choice. Also, tram and bus stop are about 10 minutes walking away which can take you to Taksim, blue mosque....The room is clean, of course, it is my second time to be here, I will be back again if I have chance back to istanbul.
Anyway, thanks for Ceren and her sister.

I really recommend this apartment!  the district is useful, there are a lot of cafes, supermarkets,  grocery and ect. the tram t1 station it takes 5-7 min by walking, from there you could get to everywhere.  the flat is warm and cozy,  a good bathroom with shower.  and Irem (she's sister Cerem) a great person!

The place was super clean with great location, ceren was fast responding and made every thing clear ,  don’t hesitate to book ceren place 
Highly recommended

host.host_about:
Mark has been in the Hotel and Food & Beverage Industry for 30 plus years 
and works a Private Chef as well a a  level 1 Sommelier . Maria owns a House Cleaning business in Kauai they currently have two properties in Kauai and and speak english and spanish . They hope to continue to acquire more properties they come from 5 Star properties and want to provide luxury style spaces for all to enjoy

reviews.comments: Overall we enjoyed the stay. Good location but while I was there many roads were still closed due to flooding. We stayed a week and asked if we could cut our stay a few days shorter because of this and the hosts were inflexible with their cancellation policy. Also, the room got very hot at night due to poor circulation making it difficult to sleep. I thought it was a good value but I probably would stay elsewhere next time.

Mark and Maria's place is absolutely lovely. It is clean, stylish, and comfortable--not to mention close to Hanalei Bay (my favorite beach on Kauai). The reception for the TV and WiFi is good as well for those looking for a night in.  You will not be disappointed if you rent this location!
Studio is really nice - everything you need is there. Very good communication with Mark & Maria

This is top notch! Bed linens, towels, bathroom, kitchen amenities, everything remodeled. It was very cozy feeling and in an absolute amazing community! We are so excited that we chose the north shore as our home and traveled from there to see the rest of the island! Stunning views, so close to Hanauma Bay our new favorite spot with fabulous coffee!! We only hope to return soon!!
We had the best stay at the condo. A beautiful place, with everything you need. It was easy to find your way there, and it was super clean and cosy!

The house is great! Everything was super clean, super nice details and hight quality amenities.

The neighborhood is great, super safe and beautiful. Also very close by car to the nearest town to have dinner.

We totally recommend Mark &Maria’s place!

Mark & Maria’s place is beautiful and cozy! We were shocked at the nice local area it was in and how great the location was. Market for groceries and lots of restaurants and beaches close by, 20 min walk to Queen’s Bath trailhead, and close to a beautiful walking/running path. We would definitely recommend and would totally stay here again! Only cons were that it was kind of dark inside the room and parking wasn’t available our first night there, we found we had to get in a little earlier and it wasn’t a problem!
Such a lovely place to stay! Clean and modern appartment, perfect located in Princeville. Highly recommended!

The condo is very cute and clean. Check in was extremely easy and convenient. It got pretty warm some nights, but if there was a breeze we were fine (we are used to air conditioning now). The patio is wonderful and nice to sit out while it’s raining. To grab food or a drink is a minimum of a mile walk- but a very quick car ride. We like the location in Princeville in the north shore. Know that right now the highway is closed passed Hanalei. We still enjoyed our stay very much!

An awesome space to be when in paradise.
Their perfect accommodations and attention to details, exemplifies the Airbnb experience.
Nice place. Clean and adequate amenities. Suite tap water had a bad taste so we filled bottles at the beach to use at the condo, which was fine

Mark and Maria’s place was so cute and in such a great location. The studio was perfect for my husband and I.  It was quiet at night and felt so “homey.” We loved sitting out on the private lanai in the evenings. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you so much!

Mark and Maria’s place was perfect for two. Clean, well stocked, everything you need to enjoy your stay on Kauai. What a spectacular place!
Loved it!
Stayed in this apartment for 11 days. Perfect for 1-2 people. Location was great as I spent quite a bit of time in Hanalei.

Great spot for a relaxing stay! We really appreciated all the amenities for cooking - we were able to eat in for most meals easily because there were pans, knives, and cooktop, and other little utensils. Since the weather and hiking conditions were not what we anticipated, it was really nice to still be able to swim in the pool and enjoy the hot tub. The room was clean and classy. Overall, it was a really nice airbnb
clean and lovely house,  not too big but you can cook by yourself,  location is nice.
Clean and comfortable and a good location on the North shore.  A good base for us. Thank you!

reviews.comments:
The apartment in on the top level of an old building. There is no elevator, which was not really a problem due to Ali's helpfulness.
The apartment is lovely decorated and has a really big terrace with a nice view. My room was spacious and comfortable.
I was warmly welcomed by Ali and his roommate. Their kind and helpful nature made my stay very pleasent. 
Although I just stayed one night, it is definitely a place worth staying longer.
Everything is enough !!

Thank you for the amazing hospitality Ali and Sedat! I enjoyed the time and definitely will choose this apartment next time with the nice view to the Marmaray Sea, clean and comfortable, strategic location, very close to Kazlıçeşme metro station, and not far from the airport.

host.host_about: Family Man. Enjoys Hawaiian Lifestyle.

reviews.comments: I recommend this nice clean place to stay, appreciated own entrance to room and friendly and helpful owners, liked it a lot.
Caio and his family were the best! Great hosts who thought of every detail and had the room spotlessly clean for us. Made sure we got in okay. Perfect location for activities south of Hilo.
Son huéspedes muy atentos y amables
Super emplacement! Ça nous a permis de visiter tout le sud de l'île. La chambre est vraiment propre et les hotes ont été très gentils! N'hésitez pas à réserver.
The host canceled this reservation 48 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Thanks for your hospitality, Caio!
Nothing fancy but You get what you pay for here plus genuine hospitality near by the lava flows and unique dining experiences at Uncles Plus close to Hilo for tsunami museum and Waterfront Parks.

If you‘re looking for a place to stay on a budget i‘d definitely recommend this place! It‘s a sweet little room which was very clean and had the most comfortable bed in it. There‘s a coffee machine, shampoo/ conditioner and even mosquito nets! Communication was very easy and fast, and we had really good WiFi! Just remember you‘re kind of in the rainforest so bring earplugs if needed cause you‘re gonna hear the crickets :)

We spent one week in this very comfortable room and we recommend this host. Dani and her husband were very welcoming and made sure everything was ok. There is no kitchen but they lent us a cooler to keep drinks and some food fresh, and a fan as well. The room and the bathroom was very clean and the bed very comfortable. They have a daughter so sometimes she can make some noise because she's still a baby  (one year and a half ), but Sofia is so cute, very friendly and sociable with guests. We had a cute hug from her when we left. For sure it is a very good place to stay in Pahoa for a very cheap price :)

We were pleased with this comfortable and clean room with private bathroom and separate entrance! We had everything that was necessary even coffee-maker and cups!
We also got extra warm welcome from the lovely dog :)
We would recommend this place to everybody.
Thanks again!!!
Super chill handy location close to town
Very Clean and Affordable, Caring and Attentive Caretakers
Nice place! I really recommend this appartement. Good price and good place :-)
Had a wonderful stay at the Pahoa House. Very clean and tidy. Hosts were friendly, welcoming and helpful. Great place for great value. Would definitely come back again!

Caio really extended much Aloha!! I arrived  late and she made the late checkin easy and that was so pleasing. For a nomadic traveler , the accommodations were perfect for me and any person that wants a cozy place to rest, shower, have a cup of coffee and get outside and see the Island!! Wonderful location !! Mahalo !!
Great place to stay for such a low price.  We were about a half hour away from Hilo, but close to the town we wanted to stay in, making it easy to grab dinners and do other fun things!
Great hospitality even as we showed up quite late at night!

Quiet and Isolated area with easy access by road. The room is affordable and convenient. 
One must expect early wake up due to the light and the presence of 2 leached dogs in the front porch.
hot sh (Website hidden by Airbnb) about volcano park was super helpful.

The place is just like in the pictures and wery clean. It's a bargain if you want to explore the vulcano and the black beaches. Pahoa is very close too. Don't be afraid of the dogs. Just open the gate and go to your room in the bag of the building. You have your own intrance. The owner is friendly too. :-)

Very nice and clean host! 
Even reachable by bus from Hilo Downtown within 1.5 to 2 hours ! Only 2 $!  

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Any time again. Thank you!
Everything was fine. It was great staying there and I would definitly recommend it.
Caio is friendly and his daughter is very cute. His house is in  nature, but very clean. Easy access to airport and volcano park.
Perfect room if you only need a place to crash in every night.
Very sweet family, great value place. Spotlessly clean, and super comfortable bed!
efficient, friendly and all a happy traveller needs!
A great place if you want to visit both the East and South side of the Island. The host was very friendly.  FYI there were two dogs; I didn't have any issues for me. Overall it was a great stay.
Great guy and a clean place to stay. I am very happy I stayed here.
nice location.  20 min from Hilo. clean room. very friendly host. recommended.

If you’re a light sleeper you will lack some sleep. The wall is shared with the main house with a closed connecting door and a child who sleeps past 10 pm ( you can hear every conversation through the door/wall). A neighboring rooster wakes you up around 4-5 am. You get what you pay for and for the price the place is good. Danielle was quick with response and a great host.

The Rocha family was wonderful and the for the price the space was great as well. Short drive to Hilo and other amenities. Neighbours were pretty noisy (especially the roosters) just make sure to bring ear plugs and it won't be a problem.

name: Light Loft | Walk to the Beach | Free Parking
summary: This bright apartment is located in Barca's most upcoming neighbourhood. Walk along the street and you will reach Barca's finest beach. So you easily get a glimp of Barca's vibrant beach life. Close to the metro station, Glories Shopping mall & the beautiful Sagrada Familia. Also Ramblas, Gothica and El Born are closeby. In these historical streets you enjoy the best original spanish tapas! Ideal place for families.  It is our pleasure to make sure you have a unforgetable stay!

Hello everybody! 

We are Liza & Joachim from Colombia and the Netherlands. We love travelling and meeting people from different cultures. We have been living in Barcelona for years now and we love the city! We know every little corner of the city and made a special book for our guests with our favourite spots and recommendations in Barcelona.

name: 2 Luxurious Flats at Trindade | Ace Location
summary: Live a local's life in the heart of Porto. You’ll find two luxurious studios in the same building with excellent details and which have Free Wifi to provide you a great atmosphere. It’s located near public transports and in Trindade. It is the best option for couples and small groups who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer. I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!
space: You will stay in two fresh and luxurious studios in the same building with the best location in the city and with modern decoration.  One of the apartments is located on the third floor and the other on sixth which is the perfect option for groups who want to stay together on the same place. You have 3 beds and 1 sofa bed to have a great night of sleep, two awesome kitchens to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a modern living room to have marvellous moments. Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country. Do you have a lot of luggage? Do not worry, you do not need to climb up the stairs, you have a lift to help you. Also, if you arrive earlier you have lockers in Trindade station to keep it. You are one step away of the metro of Trindade and very close to Aliados and Bolhão. You also have a supermarket just 5 minutes from the apartment for you to grab some food. neighborhood_overview: One of the most important streets of Porto will find all kinds of commerce, like a Pingo Doce just up the street, or restaurants in the area, shops and all kinds of transportation (the Trindade metro is 2min away and Faria Guimarães 7min).
notes: A late night check-in fee of 15€ will be charged if the check-in happens after midnight. Also, a late night check-out fee of 15€ will be charged if the check-out happens after 11am without permission.
transit: You can come by metro which the nearest Trinity is just a 2min walk away and there are also bus stops to get around the city throughout the area. If you come by car, the street parking is paid during the week from 9am to 7pm and Saturdays from 9am to 1pm, in the other periods you do not pay. It is not easy to find streets where parking is not paid, just opposite you will also find a public car park that charges the same as in the street.
access: You will have access to the entrance of the building and to the whole apartment like everything in there
interaction: I’ll always be available and will give you the best tips to explore the city and to find hidden gems. I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

host.host_about:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

name: Direct Ocean Front North Shore Condo. Amazing View
summary: Beautiful DIRECT ocean front condo! Light airy and open. Unbeatable location. Very desirable end unit. Features 2 bedrooms and a queen sleeper sofa. Located in beautiful Haleiwa. It's a quiet surf town. Honolulu is only 45 min away, if you want to visit the hustle and bustle of the city.  There are amazing food trucks right in town, only 5 min away. Or stop at Costco on your way and fill up the car!  Watch turtles and whales from ocean front slider. You will LOVE it here!
space: Spectacular 180 degree ocean view from your bedroom and living room, just steps away from miles of sandy and un-crowded beaches. Enjoy swimming, snorkeling and kayaking in the calm water, protected by the off shore reef. Historic Haleiwa town just minutes away offers dining, shopping and Galleries.  The apartment is very spacious, 960ft²(It's a LARGE end unit), and has everything you need for a home away from home, including flat-screen TV, WiFi, full kitchen amenities, plenty of towels, linens, coolers, beach chairs, fans, also a washer/dryer in the unit and an assigned covered parking spot.  There is a  natural salt water pool and hot tub, where you can cool off from sunbathing or warm up after a long snorkel trip. There is a barbecue area with two large gas grills, tables and chairs for a perfect ocean front dinner at sunset. During the winter months you can see whales breech just beyond the two reefs in front of the condo and all year round turtles feed off the reef just several fe

notes: The nightly rate is inclusive of Hawaii 4.5% General Excise Tax and 9.25% Transient Accommodation Tax.
transit: There is a bus stop one block from the condo providing easy access to Haleiwa and other North Shore favorites. Go to "TheBus" website and look up Route 76 and 88A. We also recommend renting bikes if you just want to explore the North Shore. Of course, renting a car will provide the most flexibility and access to all Oahu has to offer.
access: Our guests have access to the entire condo and building amenities, including the barbecue area, pool, and spa.
interaction: We do not live on the property but are available for tips and advice via phone or email. Our property manager will provide any onsite assistance that may be needed.
house_rules: -  Please NO shoes in condo - Please do not hang anything on railing

reviews.comments: Laurie’s home was the perfect oasis for us to explore O’ahu. Falling asleep to the sound of waves crashing and waking up to turtles on the beach was out of a dream! So close to everything you need for a great holiday. Laurie was super responsive and her cleaner saved the day when we locked ourselves out! We were traveling with a 2 year old and it was so perfect for children- the pool was quiet and the beach outside our doorstep.
Thank you Liz and Laurie for answering all of our questions and treating us so well.  The beach and snorkeling , seeing all the turtles was great!

name: Lux Studio, Olympic Beauty, King size bed,WiFi,A/C
summary: A haven of tranquility near the most action points popular and near various parks, motorways, railway station train, metro. Live in a place both peaceful and inspiring, and at the same time dynamic and trendy. Condo upscale open area. With King size bed.  Air exchanger system. Pillows "Ralph Lauren" certified asthma & allergy friendly. Custom kitchen with superior quality appliances. Quartz kitchen counter tops. Air conditioning. Superior soundproofing. Modern accommodations. Secure doors.

Modern accommodations. Secure doors.
